South Africa yet to hear from apartheid enforcers .
South Africa yet to hear from apartheid enforcers .
0,2 LOC

Anton Ferreira
Anton Ferreira
0,2 PER

CAPE TOWN 1996-08-25
CAPE TOWN 1996-08-25
0,2 LOC

South Africa 's truth commission begins issuing subpoenas this week in a bid to dig beneath the political rationales and find the sinister figures who have the blood of the country 's race war on their hands .
South Africa 's truth commission begins issuing subpoenas this week in a bid to dig beneath the political rationales and find the sinister figures who have the blood of the country 's race war on their hands .
0,2 LOC

Leaders of the major parties involved , from right-wing whites to radical blacks , appeared before Archbishop Desmond Tutu 's Truth and Reconciliation Commission last week to paint the broad picture of their actions for or against apartheid .
Leaders of the major parties involved , from right-wing whites to radical blacks , appeared before Archbishop Desmond Tutu 's Truth and Reconciliation Commission last week to paint the broad picture of their actions for or against apartheid .
17,19 PER|20,24 ORG

Most , including former president F.W. de Klerk and African National Congress Deputy President Thabo Mbeki , offered apologies for any mistakes they had made and accepted broad responsibility for the actions of their foot soldiers .
Most , including former president F.W. de Klerk and African National Congress Deputy President Thabo Mbeki , offered apologies for any mistakes they had made and accepted broad responsibility for the actions of their foot soldiers .
5,8 PER|9,12 ORG|14,16 PER

But none named those guilty of ordering or carrying out any of the gross violations of human rights which Tutu is investigating .
But none named those guilty of ordering or carrying out any of the gross violations of human rights which Tutu is investigating .
19,20 PER

Human rights lawyer Brian Currin said the hearings last week were not intended as a form of confessional and that those who personally committed crimes during apartheid would testify only before a separate arm of the commission , the amnesty committee .
Human rights lawyer Brian Currin said the hearings last week were not intended as a form of confessional and that those who personally committed crimes during apartheid would testify only before a separate arm of the commission , the amnesty committee .
3,5 PER

" I do n't think one should have expected more than what one got , " he said . "
" I do n't think one should have expected more than what one got , " he said . "


That was not the amnesty committee where perpetrators are expected to open their hearts and souls and to tell it all . "
That was not the amnesty committee where perpetrators are expected to open their hearts and souls and to tell it all . "


The commission , which has the power to grant amnesty to those who confess to abuses , has begun hearing the testimony from people already in jail for their deeds .
The commission , which has the power to grant amnesty to those who confess to abuses , has begun hearing the testimony from people already in jail for their deeds .


But others , such as self-confessed secret police hit-squad leader Dirk Coetzee , have yet to testify .
But others , such as self-confessed secret police hit-squad leader Dirk Coetzee , have yet to testify .
10,12 PER

Tutu 's deputy chairman , Alex Boraine , told reporters the commission would begin issuing subpoenas to suspects who refused to appear voluntarily some time this week .
Tutu 's deputy chairman , Alex Boraine , told reporters the commission would begin issuing subpoenas to suspects who refused to appear voluntarily some time this week .
0,1 PER|5,7 PER

He added that former hardline apartheid president P.W. Botha could be among those called .
He added that former hardline apartheid president P.W. Botha could be among those called .
7,9 PER

But Currin , who is advising several people regarded as perpetrators , said this was not the best way to achieve the commission 's aims .
But Currin , who is advising several people regarded as perpetrators , said this was not the best way to achieve the commission 's aims .
1,2 PER

" A person can be forced to appear , but the only way one is going to get to the truth in its totality is if people feel it is a good idea to go to the amnesty committee .
" A person can be forced to appear , but the only way one is going to get to the truth in its totality is if people feel it is a good idea to go to the amnesty committee .

Egypt hopes jars will reveal secrets of mummies .
Egypt hopes jars will reveal secrets of mummies .
0,1 LOC

CAIRO 1996-08-25
CAIRO 1996-08-25
0,1 LOC

Archaeologists in Egypt have found pots used by ancient Egyptians in burial rites that they say may reveal the secrets of mummification .
Archaeologists in Egypt have found pots used by ancient Egyptians in burial rites that they say may reveal the secrets of mummification .
2,3 LOC|9,10 MISC

Mohammed Saleh , director of the Egyptian Museum , told Reuters television a U.S. team found the pots , some of which contain human intestines , in a tomb built into the rocks while digging in Dahshour , a village 40 km ( 25 miles ) south of Cairo .
Mohammed Saleh , director of the Egyptian Museum , told Reuters television a U.S. team found the pots , some of which contain human intestines , in a tomb built into the rocks while digging in Dahshour , a village 40 km ( 25 miles ) south of Cairo .
0,2 PER|6,7 MISC|10,11 ORG|13,14 LOC|36,37 LOC|48,49 LOC

Dahshour is the site of Egypt 's second largest pyramid , built for the pharaoh Seneferu more than 4,500 years ago .
Dahshour is the site of Egypt 's second largest pyramid , built for the pharaoh Seneferu more than 4,500 years ago .
0,1 LOC|5,6 LOC|15,16 PER

Saleh said the team -- from New York 's Metropolitan Museum -- found four Canopic jars and two unguent jars in the tomb , which belongs to an unidentifed person who lived during the 12th Dynasty ( 1991-1786 BC ) in the Middle Kingdom .
Saleh said the team -- from New York 's Metropolitan Museum -- found four Canopic jars and two unguent jars in the tomb , which belongs to an unidentifed person who lived during the 12th Dynasty ( 1991-1786 BC ) in the Middle Kingdom .
0,1 PER|6,8 LOC|9,11 LOC|14,15 MISC|34,36 MISC|38,39 MISC|42,44 LOC

" This finding is important because one of the jars still contains substances and materials used in the conservation of mummies and the conservation of the intestines and all the things which were in the cavity of a person we have not identified yet , " Saleh said .
" This finding is important because one of the jars still contains substances and materials used in the conservation of mummies and the conservation of the intestines and all the things which were in the cavity of a person we have not identified yet , " Saleh said .
46,47 PER

" We hope that the analysis of such substances and liquids will reveal some secrets of the mummification process and materials used in this process , " he added .
" We hope that the analysis of such substances and liquids will reveal some secrets of the mummification process and materials used in this process , " he added .

Corporate America taking new view on compensation .
Corporate America taking new view on compensation .
1,2 LOC

Anne Murray
Anne Murray
0,2 PER

NEW YORK 1996-08-23
NEW YORK 1996-08-23
0,2 LOC

Corporate America is planning major changes in employee compensation in the next few years , according to a recent study .
Corporate America is planning major changes in employee compensation in the next few years , according to a recent study .
1,2 LOC

What it comes down to is this : If you 're highly skilled , you 'll benefit nicely .
What it comes down to is this : If you 're highly skilled , you 'll benefit nicely .


But if you 're not and cannot contribute to your employer 's goals , you 'll be paid less .
But if you 're not and cannot contribute to your employer 's goals , you 'll be paid less .


The survey , conducted in late 1995 and the early part of this year by management consulting firm Towers Perrin , showed that the focus will be on an employee 's overall value to the company 's bottom line -- rather than how well an employee performs a specific task .
The survey , conducted in late 1995 and the early part of this year by management consulting firm Towers Perrin , showed that the focus will be on an employee 's overall value to the company 's bottom line -- rather than how well an employee performs a specific task .
18,20 ORG

Presently , for example , if an accountant 's job involves doing five specific tasks , he or she can expect a certain salary , said Sandra O'Neal , a Towers Perrin principal .
Presently , for example , if an accountant 's job involves doing five specific tasks , he or she can expect a certain salary , said Sandra O'Neal , a Towers Perrin principal .
26,28 PER|30,32 ORG

In the future , the accountant will be evaluated solely on " knowledge , skill and abilities , " she said .
In the future , the accountant will be evaluated solely on " knowledge , skill and abilities , " she said .


In addition to using accounting skills , the accountant will also have to be creative , work well in a team , be sensitive to customer needs and set productivity goals .
In addition to using accounting skills , the accountant will also have to be creative , work well in a team , be sensitive to customer needs and set productivity goals .


" The good news is , if you 're highly skilled and have many abilities , you 'll be paid more , " said O'Neal .
" The good news is , if you 're highly skilled and have many abilities , you 'll be paid more , " said O'Neal .
24,25 PER

" The bad news is , if you 're not skilled and ca n't contribute to a team , to customer service and the organisation 's goals , you 'll be paid less . "
" The bad news is , if you 're not skilled and ca n't contribute to a team , to customer service and the organisation 's goals , you 'll be paid less . "


Of the 750 mid-to-large size corporations surveyed , 81 percent had undergone a major restructuring in the last three years , and more than two-thirds reported that productivity and profits were up as result .
Of the 750 mid-to-large size corporations surveyed , 81 percent had undergone a major restructuring in the last three years , and more than two-thirds reported that productivity and profits were up as result .


Next on the agenda for these firms is developing a new compensation structure , and 78 percent report that they are considering a new , skills-based plan for both management and non-management employees .
Next on the agenda for these firms is developing a new compensation structure , and 78 percent report that they are considering a new , skills-based plan for both management and non-management employees .


This coming shift , O'Neal said , " is not just isolated or a fad .
This coming shift , O'Neal said , " is not just isolated or a fad .
4,5 PER

It 's an inexorable change . "
It 's an inexorable change . "


After World War II , corporations adopted a " military model " creating hierarchical organisations where " the concept of defined tasks worked great , " she said .
After World War II , corporations adopted a " military model " creating hierarchical organisations where " the concept of defined tasks worked great , " she said .
1,4 MISC

But as the economy became global , customers were more demanding and problems became more complex .
But as the economy became global , customers were more demanding and problems became more complex .


" Multi-layers kept management at a distance from its customers , " O'Neal said .

12,13 PER

Now organisations must change to stay competitive .

O'Neal says firms will place a greater emphasis on teams and team performance in giving raises .

0,1 PER

If your team does well , you 'll do well .

If it does n't do well , do n't expect a raise .
If it does n't do well , do n't expect a raise .


Is this fair to an employee who can go the distance but is on a team that ca n't keep up ?

" That 's an important question we used to ask a lot , " said O'Neal . "

15,16 PER

It 's not a question we ask any more .

The more important question is -- ' Do we have results ? '
The more important question is -- ' Do we have results ? '


"
"


To get those results , 27 percent of the companies surveyed plan to eliminate base pay increases in favour of cash bonuses and incentives , such as employee and team award programmes and education .

Companies that can change their culture and view employees as business partners will do well , O'Neal said .

16,17 PER

For example , the survey rated some participants in the survey as " high-performing " companies , based on their return on equity above 16 percent .

Those companies also said they already offer employees variable pay and business education , give their managers more control over pay decisions and celebrate employee and team success .

" They respect employees more , they trust employees more and they value their employees more , " O'Neal said .

2,3 PER|8,9 MISC

JYVASKYLA , Finland 1996-08-26
JYVASKYLA , Finland 1996-08-26
0,1 LOC|2,3 LOC

Tommi Makinen took a significant step towards becoming world rally champion with a brilliant victory in the 1000 Lakes Rally on Monday .
Tommi Makinen took a significant step towards becoming world rally champion with a brilliant victory in the 1000 Lakes Rally on Monday .
0,2 PER|17,20 MISC

Mitsubishi driver Makinen stopped experienced fellow Finn Juha Kankkunen in his tracks on the final day of the 1,452-km rally , doubling his lead on the first two decisive stages .
Mitsubishi driver Makinen stopped experienced fellow Finn Juha Kankkunen in his tracks on the final day of the 1,452-km rally , doubling his lead on the first two decisive stages .
0,1 ORG|2,3 PER|6,7 MISC|7,9 PER

" This was the most difficult win - three days at 125 percent effort , " said Makinen , whose success completed his 1,000 Lakes hat-trick .
" This was the most difficult win - three days at 125 percent effort , " said Makinen , whose success completed his 1,000 Lakes hat-trick .
17,18 PER|23,25 MISC

Kankkunen was runner-up in his Toyota as Finland 's Jarmo Kytolehto produced a remarkable drive to finish third in his Ford .
Kankkunen was runner-up in his Toyota as Finland 's Jarmo Kytolehto produced a remarkable drive to finish third in his Ford .
0,1 PER|5,6 ORG|7,8 LOC|9,11 PER|20,21 ORG

Swede Kenneth Eriksson kept Subaru in the hunt for the manufacturers ' title with fifth place in spite of a gearbox problem that nearly forced him off the road close to the end of the event .
Swede Kenneth Eriksson kept Subaru in the hunt for the manufacturers ' title with fifth place in spite of a gearbox problem that nearly forced him off the road close to the end of the event .
0,1 MISC|1,3 PER|4,5 ORG

Maakinen 's and Mitsubishi 's positions were strengthened by the late retirement of Spain 's Carlos Sainz when his Ford gearbox failed .
Maakinen 's and Mitsubishi 's positions were strengthened by the late retirement of Spain 's Carlos Sainz when his Ford gearbox failed .
0,1 PER|3,4 ORG|13,14 LOC|15,17 PER|19,20 ORG

CRICKET - PAKISTAN NEED 48 RUNS TO WIN THIRD AND FINAL TEST .
CRICKET - PAKISTAN NEED 48 RUNS TO WIN THIRD AND FINAL TEST .
2,3 LOC

LONDON 1996-08-26
LONDON 1996-08-26

0,1 LOC

The tiny islands of the Seychelles failed to make soccer history at the weekend when they bowed out of the preliminary rounds of the African Nations Cup .
The tiny islands of the Seychelles failed to make soccer history at the weekend when they bowed out of the preliminary rounds of the African Nations Cup .
5,6 LOC|24,27 MISC

Trailing fellow Indian Ocean islanders Mauritius 1-0 from the first leg , they were held to a 1-1 draw at home on Saturday despite playing against 10 men for most of the match .
Trailing fellow Indian Ocean islanders Mauritius 1-0 from the first leg , they were held to a 1-1 draw at home on Saturday despite playing against 10 men for most of the match .
2,4 LOC|5,6 LOC

The 2-1 aggregate took Mauritius into the group phase of the qualifiers for the 1998 finals , and kept up the Seychelles ' record of never having won an official match in their 10 years of FIFA membership .
The 2-1 aggregate took Mauritius into the group phase of the qualifiers for the 1998 finals , and kept up the Seychelles ' record of never having won an official match in their 10 years of FIFA membership .
4,5 LOC|21,22 LOC|36,37 ORG

The Seychelles must have thought they were on course for a historic breakthrough when Mauritian midfielder Andre Caboche was sent off for a crude tackle in the 19th minute .
The Seychelles must have thought they were on course for a historic breakthrough when Mauritian midfielder Andre Caboche was sent off for a crude tackle in the 19th minute .
1,2 LOC|14,15 MISC|16,18 PER

But the visitors responded to the setback immediately -- veteran striker Ashley Mocude scoring a minute later to give them a two-goal aggregate lead .
But the visitors responded to the setback immediately -- veteran striker Ashley Mocude scoring a minute later to give them a two-goal aggregate lead .
11,13 PER

Although Danny Rose 's 50th-minute equaliser gave the Seychellois renewed hope they could not find the net again and were eliminated .
Although Danny Rose 's 50th-minute equaliser gave the Seychellois renewed hope they could not find the net again and were eliminated .
1,3 PER|8,9 MISC

MOSCOW 1996-08-26
0,1 LOC

Russian double Olympic swimming champion Alexander Popov was in a serious condition on Monday after being stabbed on a Moscow street .
Russian double Olympic swimming champion Alexander Popov was in a serious condition on Monday after being stabbed on a Moscow street .
0,1 MISC|2,3 MISC|5,7 PER|19,20 LOC

A doctor said it was too early to say whether Popov , the only man to retain the Olympic 50 and 100 metres freestyle titles , would return to top-level sport .
A doctor said it was too early to say whether Popov , the only man to retain the Olympic 50 and 100 metres freestyle titles , would return to top-level sport .
10,11 PER|18,19 MISC

" His condition is serious , " said Rimma Maslova , deputy chief doctor of Hospital No 31 in the Russian capital . "

8,10 PER|15,18 LOC|20,21 MISC

But he is conscious and is talking and smiling . "
But he is conscious and is talking and smiling . "


Maslova told Reuters she was not an expert in sports medicine , but said it was too early to judge Popov 's chances of returning to competitive swimming .
Maslova told Reuters she was not an expert in sports medicine , but said it was too early to judge Popov 's chances of returning to competitive swimming .
0,1 PER|2,3 ORG|20,21 PER

Popov , who won gold in the 50 and 100 metres freestyle at the recent Atlanta Olympics , was stabbed in the abdomen late on Saturday after an argument with a group of roadside watermelon sellers in south-west Moscow .
Popov , who won gold in the 50 and 100 metres freestyle at the recent Atlanta Olympics , was stabbed in the abdomen late on Saturday after an argument with a group of roadside watermelon sellers in south-west Moscow .
0,1 PER|15,17 MISC|38,39 LOC

Maslova said the wound had affected a lung and a kidney .
Maslova said the wound had affected a lung and a kidney .
0,1 PER

Doctors operated on Popov , 24 , for three hours .
Doctors operated on Popov , 24 , for three hours .
3,4 PER

Popov told NTV television on Sunday he was in no danger and promised he would be back in the pool shortly . "

0,1 PER|2,3 ORG

There 's no need to worry .
There 's no need to worry .


We 're going to be walking soon -- and swimming , " he insisted cheerfully from his bed in the intensive care unit .
We 're going to be walking soon -- and swimming , " he insisted cheerfully from his bed in the intensive care unit .


Interfax news agency said police had detained one of the attackers .

0,1 ORG

It said the row started when Popov and a group of his friends were returning from a party .

0,2 PER|6,10 MISC|13,15 PER|19,20 LOC|25,26 MISC

I am not a doctor but I think he is doing all right , " said Smirnov .

Two key players left a Brazilian championship match early on Sunday because they had to catch a plane to Russia to play with the national team .

Lamonts Apparel files reorganization plan .
Lamonts Apparel files reorganization plan .
0,2 ORG

[ CORRECTED 18:00 GMT ]
[ CORRECTED 18:00 GMT ]
3,4 MISC

KIRKLAND , Wash .
KIRKLAND , Wash .
0,1 LOC|2,3 LOC

1996-08-26
1996-08-26


Lamonts Apparel Inc , an operator of 42 family apparel stores in six northwestern states , said it has filed a reorganization plan in bankruptcy court in Seattle .
Lamonts Apparel Inc , an operator of 42 family apparel stores in six northwestern states , said it has filed a reorganization plan in bankruptcy court in Seattle .
0,3 ORG|27,28 LOC

( Corrects to make clear a reorganization plan has been filed ) .
( Corrects to make clear a reorganization plan has been filed ) .


The reorganization plan calls for all secured claims to be paid in full .
The reorganization plan calls for all secured claims to be paid in full .


Unsecured claims , including those of company bondholders , will be satisfied by issuing new common stock and warrants .
Unsecured claims , including those of company bondholders , will be satisfied by issuing new common stock and warrants .


Unsecured claims are estimated at about $ 90 million .
Unsecured claims are estimated at about $ 90 million .


Lamonts said it plans to issue 9 million shares of new common stock .
Lamonts said it plans to issue 9 million shares of new common stock .
0,1 ORG

Of that amount , 4.05 million and 5.67 million shares will be allocated to the company 's trade creditors .
Of that amount , 4.05 million and 5.67 million shares will be allocated to the company 's trade creditors .


Between 4.75 and 3.13 million shares will be allocated to bondholders and other unsecured non-trade creditors and 200,000 will be allocated to existing shareholders in exchange for all existing stock of the company .
Between 4.75 and 3.13 million shares will be allocated to bondholders and other unsecured non-trade creditors and 200,000 will be allocated to existing shareholders in exchange for all existing stock of the company .


Bondholders and other unsecured non-trade creditors will receive warrants four about 2.2 million shares when the company 's market capitalization reaches $ 20 million .
Bondholders and other unsecured non-trade creditors will receive warrants four about 2.2 million shares when the company 's market capitalization reaches $ 20 million .


Bondholders , other unsecured non-trade creditors , and existing shareholders also will receive warrants entitling them to roughly 800,000 shares when the company 's market capitalization reaches $ 25 million .
Bondholders , other unsecured non-trade creditors , and existing shareholders also will receive warrants entitling them to roughly 800,000 shares when the company 's market capitalization reaches $ 25 million .


Management will receive options to purchase 10 percent of the company 's outstanding common stock with protection against dilution at an option exercise price of $ 1 million .
Management will receive options to purchase 10 percent of the company 's outstanding common stock with protection against dilution at an option exercise price of $ 1 million .

More than 100 people were safely evacuated on Monday from a ferry that caught fire soon after leaving Guernsey in Britain 's Channel Islands , police said .

18,19 LOC|20,21 LOC|22,24 LOC

More than 600,000 refugees have registered to vote in 55 countries around the world , representing about 20 per cent of Bosnia 's total electorate .

Balloting inside Bosnia is scheduled for September 14 , when citizens are slated to elect municipal and cantonal assemblies , separate Moslem-Croat and Serb parliaments , a national House of Representatives and a three-man Presidency .

OSCE and independent monitors allege that Serb authorities have systematically discouraged refugees from registering to cast a ballot in the places they lived before the war .

0,1 ORG|6,7 MISC

Instead , the refugees were said to have been directed by their authorities to vote from strategic towns which had Moslem majorities before the 43-month Bosnian war , but which are now underpopulated as a result of " ethnic cleansing " .

Diplomats explain the purpose of this electoral engineering is to secure Serb control over pivotal towns inside the 49 per cent of Bosnia known as the Serb republic , consolidating through the ballot box what was initially taken in war .

After truce , Lebed faces tougher Chechen problem .
After truce , Lebed faces tougher Chechen problem .
3,4 PER|6,7 MISC

Alastair Macdonald
Alastair Macdonald
0,2 PER

MOSCOW 1996-08-26
MOSCOW 1996-08-26
0,1 LOC

Alexander Lebed may finally get to discuss his Chechen peace proposals with Boris Yeltsin on Tuesday after a lost weekend in the region when he was forced to abandon plans to sign a new political treaty with the separatist rebels .
Alexander Lebed may finally get to discuss his Chechen peace proposals with Boris Yeltsin on Tuesday after a lost weekend in the region when he was forced to abandon plans to sign a new political treaty with the separatist rebels .
0,2 PER|8,9 MISC|12,14 PER

It could be a sobering experience for the Kremlin security chief who , just two months after being appointed by the president and two heady weeks after taking charge of the Chechen crisis , had promised to wrap up the 20-month war by the weekend .
It could be a sobering experience for the Kremlin security chief who , just two months after being appointed by the president and two heady weeks after taking charge of the Chechen crisis , had promised to wrap up the 20-month war by the weekend .
8,9 LOC|31,32 MISC

Despite a mood of compromise in the region after some of the worst fighting of the war , Lebed may be just finding out that concluding a long-term settlement , somewhere between rebel demands for independence and Moscow 's insistence that Chechnya remain part of Russia , will be no easy matter .
Despite a mood of compromise in the region after some of the worst fighting of the war , Lebed may be just finding out that concluding a long-term settlement , somewhere between rebel demands for independence and Moscow 's insistence that Chechnya remain part of Russia , will be no easy matter .
18,19 PER|37,38 LOC|41,42 LOC|45,46 LOC

A chain-smoking former paratroop general with a sharp line in deadpan putdowns and a soldier 's knack for making life sound simple , Lebed managed to arrange an ambitious ceasefire in the region last week , days after the Russian army threatened to bomb its way back into the rebel-held Chechen capital Grozny .
A chain-smoking former paratroop general with a sharp line in deadpan putdowns and a soldier 's knack for making life sound simple , Lebed managed to arrange an ambitious ceasefire in the region last week , days after the Russian army threatened to bomb its way back into the rebel-held Chechen capital Grozny .
23,24 PER|39,40 MISC|50,51 MISC|52,53 LOC

He returned at the weekend , pledging to conclude a political settlement that would make this truce work where all others have failed .
He returned at the weekend , pledging to conclude a political settlement that would make this truce work where all others have failed .


But then he apparently thought better of it .
But then he apparently thought better of it .


Saying he needed to tidy up legal loose ends on the deal -- and also cover his back against unnamed pro-war schemers in Moscow -- he flew back to the capital empty-handed on Sunday .
Saying he needed to tidy up legal loose ends on the deal -- and also cover his back against unnamed pro-war schemers in Moscow -- he flew back to the capital empty-handed on Sunday .
23,24 LOC

He met Russian Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin on Monday and , according to the press service of Lebed 's Security Council , could meet Yeltsin on Tuesday .
He met Russian Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin on Monday and , according to the press service of Lebed 's Security Council , could meet Yeltsin on Tuesday .
2,3 MISC|5,7 PER|17,18 PER|19,21 ORG|24,25 PER

It was not clear if the start of Yeltsin 's holiday , announced later , would affect plans to talk .
It was not clear if the start of Yeltsin 's holiday , announced later , would affect plans to talk .
8,9 PER

Moscow 's as yet undisclosed proposals on Chechnya 's political future have , meanwhile , been sent back to do the rounds of various government departments .
Moscow 's as yet undisclosed proposals on Chechnya 's political future have , meanwhile , been sent back to do the rounds of various government departments .
0,1 LOC|7,8 LOC

It is not known what caused the delay in the peace plan .
It is not known what caused the delay in the peace plan .


Speculation mounted last week that Lebed was operating out on a limb in Chechnya as Yeltsin , hardly seen since his reelection last month , kept out of sight and then gave an interview criticising his envoy just as he clinched a truce .
Speculation mounted last week that Lebed was operating out on a limb in Chechnya as Yeltsin , hardly seen since his reelection last month , kept out of sight and then gave an interview criticising his envoy just as he clinched a truce .
5,6 PER|13,14 LOC|15,16 PER

But Chernomyrdin took pains at the weekend to insist Lebed was playing for a united team and that the proposals he took to rebel chief-of-staff Aslan Maskhadov had been agreed by Yeltsin .
But Chernomyrdin took pains at the weekend to insist Lebed was playing for a united team and that the proposals he took to rebel chief-of-staff Aslan Maskhadov had been agreed by Yeltsin .
1,2 PER|9,10 PER|25,27 PER|31,32 PER

If that were the case , it was unclear why Lebed suddenly found it necessary to have the deal verified in Moscow .
If that were the case , it was unclear why Lebed suddenly found it necessary to have the deal verified in Moscow .

2,3 LOC

His father cut him down and tried to revive him but paramedics pronounced him dead when they arrived .

1,6 ORG

FEATURE - " Eco terrorists " target UK builders .
FEATURE - " Eco terrorists " target UK builders .
7,8 LOC

Edna Fernandes
Edna Fernandes
0,2 PER

LONDON 1996-08-27
LONDON 1996-08-27
0,1 LOC

Ecological warfare has broken out across the British construction industry , striking some of the biggest corporates as activists give up peaceful protests and seek to hit builders where it hurts -- their profit margins .
Ecological warfare has broken out across the British construction industry , striking some of the biggest corporates as activists give up peaceful protests and seek to hit builders where it hurts -- their profit margins .
7,8 MISC

Described by one British company as " eco-terrorism " , it is seen as the new business risk of the 1990s .
Described by one British company as " eco-terrorism " , it is seen as the new business risk of the 1990s .
3,4 MISC

Famous names like Tarmac Plc , Costain Group Plc and ARC , a unit of conglomerate Hanson Plc , have all been targeted .
Famous names like Tarmac Plc , Costain Group Plc and ARC , a unit of conglomerate Hanson Plc , have all been targeted .
3,5 ORG|6,9 ORG|10,11 ORG|16,18 ORG

Activist groups are no longer seen by British firms as a harmless , badly organised ragbag of students and hippies .
Activist groups are no longer seen by British firms as a harmless , badly organised ragbag of students and hippies .
7,8 MISC

" You only have to see them in action at protests , " said David Harding , spokesman at ARC , Hanson 's aggregates company . "
" You only have to see them in action at protests , " said David Harding , spokesman at ARC , Hanson 's aggregates company . "
14,16 PER|19,20 ORG|21,22 ORG

They walk around with mobile phones and camera equipment , they communicate and gather support for demos via the Internet -- we 're talking about a highly sophisticated organisation . "
They walk around with mobile phones and camera equipment , they communicate and gather support for demos via the Internet -- we 're talking about a highly sophisticated organisation . "
19,20 MISC

One road protestor under the codename Steady Eddie told construction journal " Building " earlier this year , " If it comes down to full-scale economic warfare , we will aim to drive them out of business . "
One road protestor under the codename Steady Eddie told construction journal " Building " earlier this year , " If it comes down to full-scale economic warfare , we will aim to drive them out of business . "
6,8 PER|12,13 ORG

As well as financial threats , companies also emphasise the " terror " tactics used .
As well as financial threats , companies also emphasise the " terror " tactics used .


Costain 's contract to build the controversial Newbury bypass , which runs through a conservation area , has led to violent protests delaying building , bomb threats , staff intimidation and picketing of chief executive Alan Lovell 's home .

1,2 ORG|4,5 ORG

But it 's when it gets to the ( employee ) families -- that it goes across the line . "
But it 's when it gets to the ( employee ) families -- that it goes across the line . "

The government has slashed its road-building spending .

Although protests may have contributed to the decision it has been seen primarily as economic rather than ecological .

" But they are more alert than they were 3-4 years ago .

He says the damage comes in two forms : " Tangible -- in the form of extra costs , additional security , threats to staff and the more intangible damage caused by negative publicity . "

2,3 PER|8,9 LOC

LONDON 1996-08-27
LONDON 1996-08-27
0,1 LOC

Graham Gooch , the 43-year-old former England captain , is to continue playing county cricket for at least another season , his club Essex announced on Tuesday .
Graham Gooch , the 43-year-old former England captain , is to continue playing county cricket for at least another season , his club Essex announced on Tuesday .
0,2 PER|6,7 LOC|23,24 ORG

Opener Gooch 's decision comes towards the end of a season in which he has underlined his consistency by becoming the leading scorer in Essex 's history , beating Keith Fletcher 's aggregate of 29,434 .
Opener Gooch 's decision comes towards the end of a season in which he has underlined his consistency by becoming the leading scorer in Essex 's history , beating Keith Fletcher 's aggregate of 29,434 .
1,2 PER|24,25 ORG|29,31 PER

Gooch , who retired from test cricket after the 1994-95 tour of Australia but is now an England selector , is seventh in this season 's first-class averages with 1,429 runs at 64.95 , having hit five centuries and one double century .
Gooch , who retired from test cricket after the 1994-95 tour of Australia but is now an England selector , is seventh in this season 's first-class averages with 1,429 runs at 64.95 , having hit five centuries and one double century .
0,1 PER|12,13 LOC|17,18 LOC

Essex secretary-general manager Peter Edwards said : " He is a remarkable batsman and still the best in this country .
Essex secretary-general manager Peter Edwards said : " He is a remarkable batsman and still the best in this country .
0,1 ORG|3,5 PER

No-one will argue with that .
No-one will argue with that .


You just have to look at his record to appreciate that fact . "

SOCCER - ROMANIA CLUB BOSS BANNED FOR HEADBUTT .
SOCCER - ROMANIA CLUB BOSS BANNED FOR HEADBUTT .
2,3 LOC

BUCHAREST 1996-08-27
BUCHAREST 1996-08-27
0,1 LOC

The Romanian Soccer Federation has banned first division club Jiul Petrosani 's president Miron Cozma for two years for headbutting a visiting team player , a federation statement said .
The Romanian Soccer Federation has banned first division club Jiul Petrosani 's president Miron Cozma for two years for headbutting a visiting team player , a federation statement said .
1,4 ORG|9,11 ORG|13,15 PER

Romania 's soccer bosses also fined Cozma , a well-known miners ' union leader , 10 million lei ( $ 3000 ) for the half-time attack on Dinamo Bucharest 's Danut Lupu last Sunday .
Romania 's soccer bosses also fined Cozma , a well-known miners ' union leader , 10 million lei ( $ 3000 ) for the half-time attack on Dinamo Bucharest 's Danut Lupu last Sunday .
0,1 LOC|6,7 PER|27,29 ORG|30,32 PER

Miners led by Cozma rioted in Bucharest in 1990 and 1991 , bringing down the reformist government of premier Petre Roman .
Miners led by Cozma rioted in Bucharest in 1990 and 1991 , bringing down the reformist government of premier Petre Roman .
3,4 PER|6,7 LOC|19,21 PER

Cozma is awaiting trial for assault and criminal damage in a bar in his home town of Petrosan , 300 kms west of Bucharest .
Cozma is awaiting trial for assault and criminal damage in a bar in his home town of Petrosan , 300 kms west of Bucharest .
0,1 PER|17,18 LOC|23,24 LOC

The attack on Lupu came during a tunnel skirmish between opposing players as they left the field .
The attack on Lupu came during a tunnel skirmish between opposing players as they left the field .
3,4 PER

" Cozma 's blow was not too painful because I 'm a tall man , " Lupu told Reuters on Tuesday .
" Cozma 's blow was not too painful because I 'm a tall man , " Lupu told Reuters on Tuesday .
1,2 PER|16,17 PER|18,19 ORG

Lupu is one of the tallest players in Romania 's first division , towering over Cozma by some 17 cms ,
Lupu is one of the tallest players in Romania 's first division , towering over Cozma by some 17 cms ,
0,1 PER|8,9 LOC|15,16 PER

Jiul Petrosani , promoted to the first division this year , won the league game 1-0 .
Jiul Petrosani , promoted to the first division this year , won the league game 1-0 .
0,2 ORG

Cozma is barred from taking part in any official soccer activity during the ban .
Cozma is barred from taking part in any official soccer activity during the ban .
0,1 PER

TENNIS - EDBERG EXTENDS GRAND SLAM RUN , TOPPLES WIMBLEDON CHAMP .
TENNIS - EDBERG EXTENDS GRAND SLAM RUN , TOPPLES WIMBLEDON CHAMP .
2,3 PER|9,10 LOC

Larry Fine
Larry Fine
0,2 PER

NEW YORK 1996-08-27
NEW YORK 1996-08-27
0,2 LOC

Stefan Edberg produced some of his vintage best on Tuesday to extend his grand run at the Grand Slams by toppling Wimbledon champion Richard Krajicek in straight sets at the U.S. Open .
Stefan Edberg produced some of his vintage best on Tuesday to extend his grand run at the Grand Slams by toppling Wimbledon champion Richard Krajicek in straight sets at the U.S. Open .
0,2 PER|17,19 MISC|21,22 MISC|23,25 PER|30,32 MISC

Edberg , competing in the 54th consecutive and final Grand Slam event of his illustrious career , turned back the clock at Stadium Court with a flowing 6-3 6-3 6-3 serve-and-volley victory over the fifth-seeded Dutchman .
Edberg , competing in the 54th consecutive and final Grand Slam event of his illustrious career , turned back the clock at Stadium Court with a flowing 6-3 6-3 6-3 serve-and-volley victory over the fifth-seeded Dutchman .
0,1 PER|9,11 MISC|22,24 LOC|35,36 MISC

" It 's a win that I can be proud of , " said the 30-year-old Swede , winner of two U.S. Opens and six Grand Slam titles in all . "
" It 's a win that I can be proud of , " said the 30-year-old Swede , winner of two U.S. Opens and six Grand Slam titles in all . "
16,17 MISC|21,22 LOC|25,27 MISC

It 's never easy to beat the Wimbledon champion . "
It 's never easy to beat the Wimbledon champion . "
7,8 MISC

Edberg , who has said he will retire at season 's end , made it look easy under gray skies at the National Tennis Centre .
Edberg , who has said he will retire at season 's end , made it look easy under gray skies at the National Tennis Centre .
0,1 PER|22,25 LOC

The unseeded Swede struck quickly , breaking Krajicek in the first game and never let loose his grip on the one hour 44 minute match as he served and volleyed with the grace that made him one of the dominant players of his time .
The unseeded Swede struck quickly , breaking Krajicek in the first game and never let loose his grip on the one hour 44 minute match as he served and volleyed with the grace that made him one of the dominant players of his time .
2,3 MISC|7,8 PER

" There 's not doubt about it , Richard was definitely off his game and I took advantage , " said Edberg .
" There 's not doubt about it , Richard was definitely off his game and I took advantage , " said Edberg .
8,9 PER|21,22 PER

" I still have my days where I feel great out there . "
" I still have my days where I feel great out there . "


Also reaching the second round were top-seeded defending champion Pete Sampras , a 6-2 6-2 6-1 winner over last minute replacement Jimy Szymanski of Venezuela , called on after Adrian Voinea of Romania withdrew because of a sprained ankle .
Also reaching the second round were top-seeded defending champion Pete Sampras , a 6-2 6-2 6-1 winner over last minute replacement Jimy Szymanski of Venezuela , called on after Adrian Voinea of Romania withdrew because of a sprained ankle .
9,11 PER|21,23 PER|24,25 LOC|29,31 PER|32,33 LOC

Third seed Thomas Muster of Austria also charged into the second round with a 6-1 7-6 ( 7-2 ) 6-2 romp over Javier Frana of Argentina .
Third seed Thomas Muster of Austria also charged into the second round with a 6-1 7-6 ( 7-2 ) 6-2 romp over Javier Frana of Argentina .
2,4 PER|5,6 LOC|22,24 PER|25,26 LOC

Marcelo Rios of Chile , the 10th seed , also advanced .
Marcelo Rios of Chile , the 10th seed , also advanced .
0,2 PER|3,4 LOC

Rios claimed a 4-6 6-1 6-4 6-2 victory over Romania 's Andrei Pavel .
0,1 PER|9,10 LOC|11,13 PER

On the women 's side , second seed Monica Seles got off to a strong start by beating fellow-American Anne Miller 6-0 6-1 and was joined in the second round by Spain 's Arantxa Sanchez Vicario ( seeded third ) , Olympic champion Lindsay Davenport ( 8 ) and Karina Habsudova of Slovakia ( 17 ) .

0,1 LOC|5,7 LOC|9,10 ORG|27,29 ORG

The newspaper said the Central Bank special administration of Banespa ends in December 30 and after that the bank has to be liquidated or turned into a federal bank since there are no conditions to return Banespa to Sao Paulo state government .

1,3 ORG

0,1 ORG

8,10 LOC

Under the plan , the federal government would provide 100 percent of the financing needed to restructure debt of state banks being privatized , liquidated or turned into development banks .
Under the plan , the federal government would provide 100 percent of the financing needed to restructure debt of state banks being privatized , liquidated or turned into development banks .


It also offers to refinance up to 50 percent of the debt held by state banks whose governments decide to keep control of their banks .
It also offers to refinance up to 50 percent of the debt held by state banks whose governments decide to keep control of their banks .


Although the plan was designed under terms proposed by Sao Paulo state governor Mario Covas , he has showed no interest in taking part in the plan because Sao Paulo 's debt with Banespa has increased sharply , O Globo said .

0,2 LOC

U.S. Spring / White Wheat - Bids mostly steady .
U.S. Spring / White Wheat - Bids mostly steady .
0,1 LOC

CHICAGO 1996-08-27
CHICAGO 1996-08-27
0,1 LOC

Dark northern spring and white wheat bids were mostly steady on Tuesday but a few locations quoted weaker values as newly harvested spring wheat flooded the market , several cash grain dealers said .
Dark northern spring and white wheat bids were mostly steady on Tuesday but a few locations quoted weaker values as newly harvested spring wheat flooded the market , several cash grain dealers said .


" There 's too much nearby wheat coming into the market so we 're backing off the basis to slow it down , " a Montana dealer said .

0,1 MISC|4,7 PER|9,10 LOC|11,13 PER

3,4 PER|9,10 LOC|10,11 MISC|16,17 LOC|19,21 PER|27,28 MISC

The factions should agree to appoint a transitional leader , draft a new constitution , collect heavy weapons , create a national army and hold free elections in which the transitional leader would be barred from standing , he added .

0,1 PER|3,4 PER|9,10 PER|13,14 LOC|15,17 LOC|18,19 LOC|28,29 LOC

7,9 PER|14,15 PER|22,23 LOC|25,26 LOC

3,4 LOC|7,10 PER

4,5 MISC

PERTH , Australia 1996-08-27
PERTH , Australia 1996-08-27
0,1 LOC|2,3 LOC

A conman who painted common Australian parrots with dye to make them look like rare birds worth thousands of dollars was jailed for fraud on Tuesday .
A conman who painted common Australian parrots with dye to make them look like rare birds worth thousands of dollars was jailed for fraud on Tuesday .
5,6 MISC

Denham Peiris painted six green parrots , worth about A$ 100 ( US$ 79 ) a pair , with a cinnamon hair dye and traded them as Indian Ringneck Parrots , valued at A$ 14,000 a pair .
Denham Peiris painted six green parrots , worth about A$ 100 ( US$ 79 ) a pair , with a cinnamon hair dye and traded them as Indian Ringneck Parrots , valued at A$ 14,000 a pair .
0,2 PER|9,10 MISC|12,13 MISC|27,30 MISC|33,34 MISC

Peiris , 32 , of Perth , was sentenced in the Western Australian District Court to two years in jail for fraud after trading three pairs of impostor birds for 21 parrots worth a total of A$ 28,000 .
Peiris , 32 , of Perth , was sentenced in the Western Australian District Court to two years in jail for fraud after trading three pairs of impostor birds for 21 parrots worth a total of A$ 28,000 .
0,1 PER|5,6 LOC|11,13 MISC|36,37 MISC

" Everyone was fooled , " said pet shop owner Shane Drew , who unknowingly traded the disguised birds .
" Everyone was fooled , " said pet shop owner Shane Drew , who unknowingly traded the disguised birds .
10,12 PER

" I 'd already had three local breeders have a look at them and sent photos and videos of the birds to the eastern states for authentication -- they said they 're nice birds , " Drew told reporters outside court .
" I 'd already had three local breeders have a look at them and sent photos and videos of the birds to the eastern states for authentication -- they said they 're nice birds , " Drew told reporters outside court .
36,37 PER

" After I was told they were dyed , I checked them over again .
" After I was told they were dyed , I checked them over again .


It was a perfect paint job except for one feather under a wing of one bird that was only half dyed , " Drew said .
It was a perfect paint job except for one feather under a wing of one bird that was only half dyed , " Drew said .
23,24 PER

Drew said Peiris , a bird enthusiast , would have succeeded with the fraud if he had not tried to trade a fourth pair of bogus birds after an associate had told police of the scam .
Drew said Peiris , a bird enthusiast , would have succeeded with the fraud if he had not tried to trade a fourth pair of bogus birds after an associate had told police of the scam .
0,1 PER|2,3 PER

If not for the informant , the painted parrots ' true colours would not have been known for six months , he said .
If not for the informant , the painted parrots ' true colours would not have been known for six months , he said .


" They moult in the summer , so five or six months down the track , I would have looked like the guilty party , " Drew said .
" They moult in the summer , so five or six months down the track , I would have looked like the guilty party , " Drew said .

BEIJING 1996-08-27

0,1 LOC

China on Tuesday reaffirmed its support for a global nuclear test ban treaty blocked by India last week , saying the pact would be an important step in achieving total nuclear disarmament .

0,1 LOC|15,16 LOC

" Although the final draft of the treaty probably did n't totally satisfy any country , it was in general balanced , " the official People 's Daily newspaper said in a commentary .
" Although the final draft of the treaty probably did n't totally satisfy any country , it was in general balanced , " the official People 's Daily newspaper said in a commentary .
25,28 ORG

India blocked the Comprehensive Test Ban Treaty ( CTBT ) at the Conference on Disarmament in Geneva , saying the pact did not contain a clause committing the five declared nuclear powers to a timetable for nuclear disarmament .

0,1 LOC|3,7 MISC|8,9 MISC|12,15 MISC|16,17 LOC

New Delhi 's stance , which was seen as effectively thwarting 2-1/2 years of negotiations at the Conference on Disarmament , drew widespread but generally muted foreign criticism .

0,1 LOC|14,18 ORG

China said many countries had compromised to complete the treaty and that the issue of a disarmament schedule could be discussed in future negotiations .

0,1 LOC

" The completion of the test ban treaty would be an important and practical step in the gradual process of achieving total nuclear disarmament , " it said .
" The completion of the test ban treaty would be an important and practical step in the gradual process of achieving total nuclear disarmament , " it said .


China has pledged support for the pact since reaching a deal with the United States that made international inspections of nuclear sites more difficult than in earlier drafts of the accord .
China has pledged support for the pact since reaching a deal with the United States that made international inspections of nuclear sites more difficult than in earlier drafts of the accord .
0,1 LOC|13,15 LOC

0,1 LOC

TOKYO 1996-08-27
TOKYO 1996-08-27
0,1 LOC

The government said on Tuesday that the threat from a mysterious killer germ , while still requiring vigilance , appears to be receding in the western Japan city of Sakai , where the epidemic hit the hardest .
The government said on Tuesday that the threat from a mysterious killer germ , while still requiring vigilance , appears to be receding in the western Japan city of Sakai , where the epidemic hit the hardest .
26,27 LOC|29,30 LOC

The food poisoning epidemic caused by the O-157 colon bacillus in Sakai appears to be " settling down " , Health Minister Naoto Kan was quoted by a government spokesman as telling the cabinet .
The food poisoning epidemic caused by the O-157 colon bacillus in Sakai appears to be " settling down " , Health Minister Naoto Kan was quoted by a government spokesman as telling the cabinet .
7,8 MISC|11,12 LOC|22,24 PER

The O-157 colon bacillus has been found responsible for a widespread food poisoning epidemic that has killed 11 people and made over 9,500 ill this year .
The O-157 colon bacillus has been found responsible for a widespread food poisoning epidemic that has killed 11 people and made over 9,500 ill this year .
1,2 MISC

Sakai , near the regional commercial centre of Osaka , has been hit hardest by the deadly bacteria , with nearly 6,500 , mostly schoolchildren , affected by the disease .

Japan aluminium shipments surge 8.9 pct in July .
Japan aluminium shipments surge 8.9 pct in July .
0,1 LOC

TOKYO 1996-08-27
TOKYO 1996-08-27
0,1 LOC

Japanese shipments of aluminium mill products in July surged 8.9 percent over the same month last year to 224,609 tonnes , while production rose 6.4 percent to 222,457 tonnes , according to preliminary data released on Tuesday by the Japan Aluminium Federation .
Japanese shipments of aluminium mill products in July surged 8.9 percent over the same month last year to 224,609 tonnes , while production rose 6.4 percent to 222,457 tonnes , according to preliminary data released on Tuesday by the Japan Aluminium Federation .
0,1 MISC|39,42 ORG

The surge reflected strong demand from the beverage can and housing construction sectors , federation officials said .
The surge reflected strong demand from the beverage can and housing construction sectors , federation officials said .


Figures released two weeks ago from Japan 's seven largest mills already showed that Japan 's can sheet output reached its highest monthly level ever in July , reflecting above-average temperatures that sparked a jump in beer consumption .
Figures released two weeks ago from Japan 's seven largest mills already showed that Japan 's can sheet output reached its highest monthly level ever in July , reflecting above-average temperatures that sparked a jump in beer consumption .
6,7 LOC|14,15 LOC

A federation official added that the half-year through September 1996 also appeared likely to set a new record for can production , despite cooler temperatures in August .
A federation official added that the half-year through September 1996 also appeared likely to set a new record for can production , despite cooler temperatures in August .


July inventories stood at 75,632 tonnes , down 2.6 percent from the prior month .
July inventories stood at 75,632 tonnes , down 2.6 percent from the prior month .


July foil output was off 0.2 percent year-on-year at 11,525 tonnes , while foil shipments fell 0.8 percent to 11,244 tonnes .
July foil output was off 0.2 percent year-on-year at 11,525 tonnes , while foil shipments fell 0.8 percent to 11,244 tonnes .


June mill output data were revised slightly downward to 210,622 tonnes from the preliminary 210,683 , while shipments were revised marginally upward to 213,989 tonnes from 213,845 .
June mill output data were revised slightly downward to 210,622 tonnes from the preliminary 210,683 , while shipments were revised marginally upward to 213,989 tonnes from 213,845 .


Final figures for June pegged can stock shipments at 40,144 tonnes , up 2.4 percent year-on-year .
Final figures for June pegged can stock shipments at 40,144 tonnes , up 2.4 percent year-on-year .


Shipments to the auto sector fell 5.5 percent to 15,286 tonnes , while the construction sector rose 2.4 percent to 79,390 tonnes .

Exports dipped 3.7 percent to 18,867 tonnes .
Exports dipped 3.7 percent to 18,867 tonnes .

SEC adopts rules to improve investor access to best stock prices .
SEC adopts rules to improve investor access to best stock prices .
0,1 ORG

WASHINGTON 1996-08-28
WASHINGTON 1996-08-28
0,1 LOC

The Securities and Exchange Commission Wednesday approved rules designed to give stock market investors a better chance at getting the best price available for their orders .
The Securities and Exchange Commission Wednesday approved rules designed to give stock market investors a better chance at getting the best price available for their orders .
1,5 ORG

The so-called order handling rules , which were proposed last September , were approved in a 4-0 vote .
The so-called order handling rules , which were proposed last September , were approved in a 4-0 vote .


The new rules will require specialists at stock exchanges and market makers on Nasdaq to allow customers to view price quotes from other electronic trading systems that may not be readily available to them .
The new rules will require specialists at stock exchanges and market makers on Nasdaq to allow customers to view price quotes from other electronic trading systems that may not be readily available to them .
13,14 MISC

The rules will also require that customer limit orders be displayed with prices better than those available in quotes publicly available at the time .
The rules will also require that customer limit orders be displayed with prices better than those available in quotes publicly available at the time .


Specialists and market makers are companies or individuals recognised as qualified to maintain an orderly market in a stock .
Specialists and market makers are companies or individuals recognised as qualified to maintain an orderly market in a stock .


In a limit order , investors specify the price at which they are willing to buy or sell , as opposed to a market order executed at prevailing prices .
In a limit order , investors specify the price at which they are willing to buy or sell , as opposed to a market order executed at prevailing prices .


" These rules are intended to empower all investors , by allowing their orders to compete on a level playing field , and by providing the disclosure they need to make informed decisions , " said SEC Chairman Arthur Levitt .
" These rules are intended to empower all investors , by allowing their orders to compete on a level playing field , and by providing the disclosure they need to make informed decisions , " said SEC Chairman Arthur Levitt .
36,37 ORG|38,40 PER

The SEC 's goal , he added , was to create " one system where one price could be available to everybody . "
The SEC 's goal , he added , was to create " one system where one price could be available to everybody . "
1,2 ORG

The director of the SEC 's division of market regulation , Richard Lindsey , said Wall Street firms will probably need to spend about $ 7 million to carry out the improvements called for by the new rules .
The director of the SEC 's division of market regulation , Richard Lindsey , said Wall Street firms will probably need to spend about $ 7 million to carry out the improvements called for by the new rules .
4,5 ORG|11,13 PER|15,17 LOC

In proposing the rules last year , the SEC noted that while technology has improved , commonplace practices still existed that worked against investors ' best interests .
In proposing the rules last year , the SEC noted that while technology has improved , commonplace practices still existed that worked against investors ' best interests .
8,9 ORG

It noted that customers whose orders were not displayed lost the chance of getting the best possible price available in the market .
It noted that customers whose orders were not displayed lost the chance of getting the best possible price available in the market .


It also cited the potential problem of a two-tiered market in which market makers quote one price to public investors while quoting better prices in private systems , thus robbing investors without access to " hidden " quotes the benefit of the best available prices .
It also cited the potential problem of a two-tiered market in which market makers quote one price to public investors while quoting better prices in private systems , thus robbing investors without access to " hidden " quotes the benefit of the best available prices .


Earlier this month , the SEC settled charges of alleged malpractices on Nasdaq when the parent of the Nasdaq market , the National Association of Securities Dealers , agreed to spend $ 100 million over five years to upgrade its oversight of brokers ' trading practices .
Earlier this month , the SEC settled charges of alleged malpractices on Nasdaq when the parent of the Nasdaq market , the National Association of Securities Dealers , agreed to spend $ 100 million over five years to upgrade its oversight of brokers ' trading practices .
5,6 ORG|12,13 MISC|18,19 MISC|22,27 ORG

The SEC dropped a third proposal that would have allowed investors with market orders to trade at a better price if there were shifts in prices before their orders were executed .
The SEC dropped a third proposal that would have allowed investors with market orders to trade at a better price if there were shifts in prices before their orders were executed .
1,2 ORG

The agency said it would monitor effects of the two new rules before considering the " price improvement " proposal again .
The agency said it would monitor effects of the two new rules before considering the " price improvement " proposal again .


The agency also proposed rule changes that would require continuous " bid " and " ask " quotations from exchange specialists and market makers who trade more than 1 percent of a stock during any quarter on Nasdaq .
The agency also proposed rule changes that would require continuous " bid " and " ask " quotations from exchange specialists and market makers who trade more than 1 percent of a stock during any quarter on Nasdaq .
37,38 MISC

The SEC 's limit order display rule will mean a major change for Nasdaq , where such orders have never been displayed .
The SEC 's limit order display rule will mean a major change for Nasdaq , where such orders have never been displayed .
1,2 ORG|13,14 MISC

The president of the Nasdaq , Alfred Berkeley , was to hold a news conference Wednesday afternoon to elaborate on the new rules ' effects on the market , the second largest in the world .
The president of the Nasdaq , Alfred Berkeley , was to hold a news conference Wednesday afternoon to elaborate on the new rules ' effects on the market , the second largest in the world .
4,5 MISC|6,8 PER

-DOCSTART-
-DOCSTART-

The police spokesman said he was not sure whether any more passengers were still trapped in the wreckage .
The police spokesman said he was not sure whether any more passengers were still trapped in the wreckage .


Doctors and medical staff from a hospital across the road from the station were at the scene of the accident within minutes and were able to treat the injured quickly , he added .

Greater damage was averted as the driver of the passenger train had time to apply his emergency brakes before the collision occurred , a state railways spokesman told Austrian news agency APA .

CYCLING - BOARDMAN FULFILS WORLD RECORD PREDICTION .
CYCLING - BOARDMAN FULFILS WORLD RECORD PREDICTION .
2,3 PER

Martin Ayres
Martin Ayres
0,2 PER

MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-28
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-28
0,1 LOC|2,3 LOC

Britain 's Chris Boardman fulfilled his prediction that he would break the world 4,000 metres world record in the world track cycling championships on Wednesday .
Britain 's Chris Boardman fulfilled his prediction that he would break the world 4,000 metres world record in the world track cycling championships on Wednesday .
0,1 LOC|2,4 PER

Boardman clocked four minutes 13.353 seconds to slice more than six seconds from the previous world mark of 4:19.699 set by Olympic champion Andrea Collinelli of Italy in Atlanta in July .
Boardman clocked four minutes 13.353 seconds to slice more than six seconds from the previous world mark of 4:19.699 set by Olympic champion Andrea Collinelli of Italy in Atlanta in July .
0,1 PER|21,22 MISC|23,25 PER|26,27 LOC|28,29 LOC

Collinelli qualified in second place , also beating his old record in 4:17.696 .
Collinelli qualified in second place , also beating his old record in 4:17.696 .
0,1 PER

" I was very nervous before the start but then I was amazed by the speed of my ride , " Boardman said . "
" I was very nervous before the start but then I was amazed by the speed of my ride , " Boardman said . "
21,22 PER

I do n't know if I can go any faster .
I do n't know if I can go any faster .


Who knows what will happen in the later stages ? "
Who knows what will happen in the later stages ? "


Boardman , 28 , did not contest the Olympic pursuit because of its proximity to the Tour de France in which he led the French GAN team .
Boardman , 28 , did not contest the Olympic pursuit because of its proximity to the Tour de France in which he led the French GAN team .
0,1 PER|8,9 MISC|16,19 MISC|24,25 MISC|25,26 ORG

However , he took a bronze medal in the Olympic road time-trial and then returned home to prepare for the world track series in the Manchester indoor velodrome .
However , he took a bronze medal in the Olympic road time-trial and then returned home to prepare for the world track series in the Manchester indoor velodrome .
9,10 MISC|25,26 LOC

He adopted the " superman " riding position with arms at full stretch perfected by fellow Briton Graeme Obree , the 1995 world champion , and taken up in Atlanta by Collinelli .
He adopted the " superman " riding position with arms at full stretch perfected by fellow Briton Graeme Obree , the 1995 world champion , and taken up in Atlanta by Collinelli .
16,17 MISC|17,19 PER|29,30 LOC|31,32 PER

Obree was forced to pull out of his title defence because of a viral infection .
Obree was forced to pull out of his title defence because of a viral infection .
0,1 PER

2,3 PER

MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-28
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-28

Britain 's Chris Boardman broke the world 4,000 metres cycling record by more than six seconds at the world championships on Wednesday .

0,1 LOC|2,4 PER

15,16 PER

" The more important thing for me was to get them down here and have a chat .

To go another five weeks without that chance would have been foolish , " he added .

Leading rider Jason Weaver received a 21-day ban from the disciplinary committee of the Jockey Club on Wednesday .
Leading rider Jason Weaver received a 21-day ban from the disciplinary committee of the Jockey Club on Wednesday .
2,4 PER|14,16 ORG

Weaver had been reported after being found guilty of irresponsible riding at the provincial track of Pontefract 10 days ago .
Weaver had been reported after being found guilty of irresponsible riding at the provincial track of Pontefract 10 days ago .
0,1 PER|16,17 LOC

It was his fourth riding offence this season .
It was his fourth riding offence this season .


Although five days of the ban were suspended until January 1 , Weaver will miss next month 's big St Leger meeting , including the ride on top stayer Double Trigger in the Doncaster Cup .

I 'm only 34 .

Some say that 's too old for an athlete , " he said .
Some say that 's too old for an athlete , " he said .

NEW YORK 1996-08-28
0,2 LOC

Second seed and co-world number one Monica Seles advanced to the third round of the U.S. Open Tennis Championships without hitting a ball on Wednesday .

6,8 PER|15,19 MISC

Seles , the 1991 and 1992 champion who dropped just one game in her opening match , was scheduled to play Laurence Courtois of Belgium Wednesay night .

0,1 PER|21,23 PER|24,25 LOC

But tournament officials announced about four-and-a-half hours before the match that Courtois had pulled out due to a left knee bone inflammation , moving Seles into the next round on a walkover .

TENNIS - SERIOUS MEDVEDEV IS HAVING FUN AGAIN .
TENNIS - SERIOUS MEDVEDEV IS HAVING FUN AGAIN .
3,4 PER

Richard Finn
Richard Finn
0,2 PER

NEW YORK 1996-08-28
NEW YORK 1996-08-28
0,2 LOC

Outspoken Andrei Medvedev exchanged his reputation as the clown prince of tennis on Wednesday for a new no-nonsense attitude that has made life on the courts fun again .
Outspoken Andrei Medvedev exchanged his reputation as the clown prince of tennis on Wednesday for a new no-nonsense attitude that has made life on the courts fun again .
1,3 PER

" I think I 'm much more focused on what I have to do , and that 's playing tennis , " Medvedev said after routing Frenchman Jean-Philippe Fleurian 6-2 6-0 6-1 in the opening round of the U.S. Open .
" I think I 'm much more focused on what I have to do , and that 's playing tennis , " Medvedev said after routing Frenchman Jean-Philippe Fleurian 6-2 6-0 6-1 in the opening round of the U.S. Open .
22,23 PER|26,27 MISC|27,29 PER|38,40 MISC

It was Medvedev 's sixth victory in a row after winning his first tournament of the year last week at the Hamlet Cup .
It was Medvedev 's sixth victory in a row after winning his first tournament of the year last week at the Hamlet Cup .
2,3 PER|21,23 MISC

" I realised this year , that without putting 99.9 percent of your mind into tennis , I do n't think you can successful , " said the 22-year-old Medvedev .
" I realised this year , that without putting 99.9 percent of your mind into tennis , I do n't think you can successful , " said the 22-year-old Medvedev .
29,30 PER

" The whole day I 'm thinking abnout tennis .
" The whole day I 'm thinking abnout tennis .


I felt that all the other things I was doing the years before , they were distracting me , they were not helping me at all . "
I felt that all the other things I was doing the years before , they were distracting me , they were not helping me at all . "


For Medvedev that meant confining his post-match comments to tennis and not going off on tirades about about peripheral issues such as the poor quality of food in the players lounge , an entertaining rant that took his mind off the task at hand .
For Medvedev that meant confining his post-match comments to tennis and not going off on tirades about about peripheral issues such as the poor quality of food in the players lounge , an entertaining rant that took his mind off the task at hand .
1,2 PER

" I know what I 'm here for , " said Medvedev , who lost in the second round of the Open the last two years after reaching the quarters in 1993 , the same year he tried his hand as a restaurant critic .
" I know what I 'm here for , " said Medvedev , who lost in the second round of the Open the last two years after reaching the quarters in 1993 , the same year he tried his hand as a restaurant critic .
11,12 PER|21,22 MISC

" I 'm not here to fight the press or talk about the food or entertain the people off the court .
" I 'm not here to fight the press or talk about the food or entertain the people off the court .


I 'm here to play tennis and to win .
I 'm here to play tennis and to win .


I have much less fun off the court .
I have much less fun off the court .


I have much more fun on the court , " he said .
I have much more fun on the court , " he said .


Just three years ago Medvedev was one of the world 's best , with a ranking of six after reaching the French Open semifinal and winning three tournaments .
Just three years ago Medvedev was one of the world 's best , with a ranking of six after reaching the French Open semifinal and winning three tournaments .
4,5 PER|21,23 MISC

But Medvedev 's ranking slowly began to drop last year as he struggled with a wrist injury .
But Medvedev 's ranking slowly began to drop last year as he struggled with a wrist injury .
1,2 PER

The Ukrainian finally hit a low of 44th two months ago .
The Ukrainian finally hit a low of 44th two months ago .
1,2 MISC

" It 's somewhere where I would n't like to stay very long , " Medvedev said of his current ranking of 36 . "
" It 's somewhere where I would n't like to stay very long , " Medvedev said of his current ranking of 36 . "
15,16 PER

It 's a part of the penalty that I have to accept . "
It 's a part of the penalty that I have to accept . "


As part of his new businesslike approach , Medvedev hired Australian coach Bob Brett at the start of this year and the partnership is beginning to pay off .
As part of his new businesslike approach , Medvedev hired Australian coach Bob Brett at the start of this year and the partnership is beginning to pay off .
8,9 PER|10,11 MISC|12,14 PER

" At the beginning of the year we started from zero , " said Medvedev . "
" At the beginning of the year we started from zero , " said Medvedev . "
14,15 PER

Winning in Long Island ( last week ) was like winning for the first time . "
Winning in Long Island ( last week ) was like winning for the first time . "
2,4 LOC

While Medvedev 's 77-minute romp past Fleurian was rather ordinary , the fact that the two were playing each other was rather remarkable .
While Medvedev 's 77-minute romp past Fleurian was rather ordinary , the fact that the two were playing each other was rather remarkable .
1,2 PER|6,7 PER

In the original draw , Medvedev and Fleurian were slotted to play each other .

5,6 PER|7,8 PER

When controversy forced the draw to be done over -- against odds of 151-to-1 -- Medvedev and Fleurian drew each other a second time .

15,16 PER|17,18 PER

" When I saw the new draw I did n't have to change my preparation , " Medvedev said . "

2,3 PER

Bill Berkrot
Bill Berkrot
0,2 PER

NEW YORK 1996-08-27
NEW YORK 1996-08-27
0,2 LOC

It was n't supposed to be this hard for defending champion Steffi Graf to win her opening match at the U.S. Open on Tuesday night .
It was n't supposed to be this hard for defending champion Steffi Graf to win her opening match at the U.S. Open on Tuesday night .
11,13 PER|20,22 MISC

But the script that called for the usual first-round demolition by the top-ranked top seed was rewritten by 29th-ranked Indonesian Yayuk Basuki playing with nothing to lose abandon .

19,20 MISC|20,22 PER

Graf , of course , prevailed 6-3 7-6 , but not before some tense moments that even had the German superstar thinking the match was going three sets .

0,1 PER|19,20 MISC

" I won the second set , which I did n't think I would do , being down 5-2 and the chances she had at 6-5 , " Graf recalled .

28,29 PER

Several of the other women 's seeds eased into the second round with more typical Graf-like efficiency Tuesday .

15,16 MISC

As afternoon turned to evening , fourth-seeded Spaniard Conchita Martinez took apart Romanian Ruxandra Dragomir in 58 minutes with the loss of just two games , one more than second seed Monica Seles , who opened the second-day programme by crushing American Anne Miller 6-0 6-1 .
As afternoon turned to evening , fourth-seeded Spaniard Conchita Martinez took apart Romanian Ruxandra Dragomir in 58 minutes with the loss of just two games , one more than second seed Monica Seles , who opened the second-day programme by crushing American Anne Miller 6-0 6-1 .
7,8 MISC|8,10 PER|12,13 MISC|13,15 PER|31,33 PER|41,42 MISC|42,44 PER

Third seed Arantxa Sanchez Vicario , the 1994 champion , and eighth-seeded Olympic gold medalist Lindsay Davenport dropped three game each en route to the second round .

2,5 PER|12,13 MISC|15,17 PER

But the day was not without its seeded casualties on the women 's side .
But the day was not without its seeded casualties on the women 's side .


Fifth-seed Iva Majoli of Croatia was picked off by Austrian Judith Wiesner and Wimbledon semifinalist Kimiko Date of Japan , the 10th seed , fell 6-2 7-5 to 53rd-ranked American Kimberly Po .

But Graf , winner of 20 Grand Slam titles , was not about to join that list .

" At some points I felt a little nervous , " she admitted . "

It also wants to hear from those who committed the abuses , to whom it can offer amnesty in return for frankness .

Hopes that reformed perpetrators would come forward voluntarily have faded but the commission has the legal power to force them to appear .

Allen declined to give say who would be subpoenaed .

When it approved Avonex in May , the FDA said both Biogen 's product and Betaseron were developed under the incentives of the Ophran Drug Act which provides seven years of marketing exclusivity for products that treat rare diseases .

Alloy shipments , however , were 7.5 percent down .

UK lowers noise limits for three London airports .
UK lowers noise limits for three London airports .
0,1 LOC|6,7 LOC

LONDON 1996-08-28
LONDON 1996-08-28
0,1 LOC

The British government on Wednesday lowered the noise limits for London 's Heathrow , Gatwick and Stansted airports and announced it would make a bigger effort in detecting and fining violators .
The British government on Wednesday lowered the noise limits for London 's Heathrow , Gatwick and Stansted airports and announced it would make a bigger effort in detecting and fining violators .
1,2 MISC|10,11 LOC|12,13 LOC|14,15 LOC|16,17 LOC

The limits , effective from January 1 , 1997 , are reduced as much as possible while still complying with international obligations , a spokesman for the Department of Transport said .
The limits , effective from January 1 , 1997 , are reduced as much as possible while still complying with international obligations , a spokesman for the Department of Transport said .
27,30 ORG

The maximum noise level during the day is trimmed by three decibels to 94 , while the night time level is reduced by two decibels to 87 .
The maximum noise level during the day is trimmed by three decibels to 94 , while the night time level is reduced by two decibels to 87 .


" It is a smaller reduction in terms of loudness than was sought by local people .
" It is a smaller reduction in terms of loudness than was sought by local people .


Nevertheless I am satisfied that the overall benefits will be worthwile , " Lord Goschen , minister for aviation , said in a statement .
Nevertheless I am satisfied that the overall benefits will be worthwile , " Lord Goschen , minister for aviation , said in a statement .
14,15 PER

The ministry said it believed the new limits could be met with existing aircraft . "
The ministry said it believed the new limits could be met with existing aircraft . "


They can be flown in quieter ways , " a spokesman said .
They can be flown in quieter ways , " a spokesman said .


The reduction in noise levels is the same as proposed in a consultation paper which was published in October 1995 .
The reduction in noise levels is the same as proposed in a consultation paper which was published in October 1995 .


The present noise levels have applied at Heathrow , one of the world 's busiest airports , since 1959 and at Gatwick since 1968 .
The present noise levels have applied at Heathrow , one of the world 's busiest airports , since 1959 and at Gatwick since 1968 .
7,8 LOC|21,22 LOC

The number of monitors will be increased and some will be repositioned to detect noisy planes .
The number of monitors will be increased and some will be repositioned to detect noisy planes .
