Romania state budget soars in June .
Romania state budget soars in June .
0,1 LOC

BUCHAREST 1996-08-28
BUCHAREST 1996-08-28
0,1 LOC

Romania 's state budget deficit jumped sharply in June to 1,242.9 billion lei for the January-June period from 596.5 billion lei in January-May , official data showed on Wednesday .
Romania 's state budget deficit jumped sharply in June to 1,242.9 billion lei for the January-June period from 596.5 billion lei in January-May , official data showed on Wednesday .
0,1 LOC

Six-month expenditures stood at 9.50 trillion lei , up from 7.56 trillion lei at end-May , with education and health spending accounting for 31.6 percent of state expenses and economic subsidies and support taking some 26 percent .
Six-month expenditures stood at 9.50 trillion lei , up from 7.56 trillion lei at end-May , with education and health spending accounting for 31.6 percent of state expenses and economic subsidies and support taking some 26 percent .


January-June revenues went up to 8.26 trillion lei from 6.96 trillion lei in the first five months this year .
January-June revenues went up to 8.26 trillion lei from 6.96 trillion lei in the first five months this year .


Romania 's government is expected to revise the 1996 budget on Wednesday to bring it into line with higher inflation , new wage and pension indexations and costs of energy imports that have pushed up the state deficit .
Romania 's government is expected to revise the 1996 budget on Wednesday to bring it into line with higher inflation , new wage and pension indexations and costs of energy imports that have pushed up the state deficit .
0,1 LOC

Under the revised version state spending is expected to rise by some 566 billion lei .
Under the revised version state spending is expected to rise by some 566 billion lei .


No new deficit forecast has been issued so far .
No new deficit forecast has been issued so far .


In July the government gave a 6.0-percent wage and pension indexation to cover energy , fuel and bread price increases , which quickened inflation to 7.5 percent last month .
In July the government gave a 6.0-percent wage and pension indexation to cover energy , fuel and bread price increases , which quickened inflation to 7.5 percent last month .


In the original state budget , approved in March , revenues were envisaged at around 16.98 trillion lei and expenditures 20.17 trillion lei for 1996 .
In the original state budget , approved in March , revenues were envisaged at around 16.98 trillion lei and expenditures 20.17 trillion lei for 1996 .


The state budget deficit was originally forecast to be 3.19 trillion lei for the whole year .
The state budget deficit was originally forecast to be 3.19 trillion lei for the whole year .


On Wednesday , the leu 's official rate was 3,161 to the dollar .
On Wednesday , the leu 's official rate was 3,161 to the dollar .

Quake shakes Costa Rica during Hashimoto visit .
Quake shakes Costa Rica during Hashimoto visit .
2,4 LOC|5,6 PER

SAN JOSE , Costa Rica 1996-08-28
SAN JOSE , Costa Rica 1996-08-28
0,2 LOC|3,5 LOC

A moderate earthquake measuring 5.0 on the Richter scale shook Costa Rica on Wednesday during a visit by Japanese Prime Minister Ryutaro Hashimoto , but there were no reports of casualties or damage , officials said .
A moderate earthquake measuring 5.0 on the Richter scale shook Costa Rica on Wednesday during a visit by Japanese Prime Minister Ryutaro Hashimoto , but there were no reports of casualties or damage , officials said .
7,8 PER|10,12 LOC|18,19 MISC|21,23 PER

The quake struck at 11.16 a.m. ( 1716 GMT ) and was centred 10 miles ( 16 km ) south of the port of Quepos , which is 90 miles ( 140 km ) south of the capital San Jose , the Costa Rican Volcanic and Seismologicial Observatory said .
The quake struck at 11.16 a.m. ( 1716 GMT ) and was centred 10 miles ( 16 km ) south of the port of Quepos , which is 90 miles ( 140 km ) south of the capital San Jose , the Costa Rican Volcanic and Seismologicial Observatory said .
8,9 MISC|24,25 LOC|38,40 LOC|42,48 ORG

The quake was felt for about seven seconds in most of the country but preliminary reports said no one was hurt , it added .
The quake was felt for about seven seconds in most of the country but preliminary reports said no one was hurt , it added .


The quake took place a few minutes before the end of a welcoming ceremony at Juan Santamaria airport for Hashimoto , who was starting a three-hour visit as part of a Latin American tour .

" It 's definitely a turnabout from this past year , but you know last year we had pretty good moisture about this time of year , and then about October 1 it quit , " said Mark Hodges , executive director of the Oklahoma Wheat Commission . "

37,39 PER|44,47 ORG

Hopefully that 's not going to happen this year . "

Belgium bank sanctions $ 6.5 mln loan to India WSRL .
Belgium bank sanctions $ 6.5 mln loan to India WSRL .
0,1 LOC|8,9 LOC|9,10 ORG

BOMBAY 1996-08-28
BOMBAY 1996-08-28
0,1 LOC

Belgium 's Kredietbank has approved a $ 6.5 million loan to India 's Welspun Stahl Rohren Ltd ( WSRL ) to part-finance its submerged arc welded pipes plant , the Indian company said in a statement on Wednesday .
Belgium 's Kredietbank has approved a $ 6.5 million loan to India 's Welspun Stahl Rohren Ltd ( WSRL ) to part-finance its submerged arc welded pipes plant , the Indian company said in a statement on Wednesday .
0,1 LOC|2,3 ORG|11,12 LOC|13,17 ORG|18,19 ORG|30,31 MISC

The loan is at LIBOR plus one percent , it said .
The loan is at LIBOR plus one percent , it said .
4,5 MISC

The loan , maturing in six years , is guaranteed by Indusind Bank for $ 3.5 million and by UTI Bank for $ 3 million , it said .
The loan , maturing in six years , is guaranteed by Indusind Bank for $ 3.5 million and by UTI Bank for $ 3 million , it said .
11,13 ORG|19,21 ORG

The WSRL plant , located in the western Indian state of Gujarat , will have a capacity to manufacture 175,000 tonnes per annum of longitudinal pipes and 25,000 tonnes per annum of spiral welded pipes , the statement said .
The WSRL plant , located in the western Indian state of Gujarat , will have a capacity to manufacture 175,000 tonnes per annum of longitudinal pipes and 25,000 tonnes per annum of spiral welded pipes , the statement said .
1,2 ORG|8,9 MISC|11,12 LOC

The longitudinal pipes plant is expected to be complete by the second quarter of September 1997 and the saw arc welded pipes plant by September 1996 , it said .
The longitudinal pipes plant is expected to be complete by the second quarter of September 1997 and the saw arc welded pipes plant by September 1996 , it said .


WSRL is part of the Welspun group which has a presence in the cotton yarn , terry towels and polyester yarn industry , the statement said .
WSRL is part of the Welspun group which has a presence in the cotton yarn , terry towels and polyester yarn industry , the statement said .
0,1 ORG|5,6 ORG

-- Bombay newsroom +91-22-265 9000

India fishermen say forced to carry Tamil refugees .
India fishermen say forced to carry Tamil refugees .
0,1 LOC|6,7 MISC

P.V. Krishnamoorthy
P.V. Krishnamoorthy
0,2 PER

RAMESWARAM , India 1996-08-28
RAMESWARAM , India 1996-08-28
0,1 LOC|2,3 LOC

Indian fishermen said on Wednesday they had been forced at gunpoint to ferry refugees fleeing the ethnic war in Sri Lanka to India , as a protest strike by more than 30,000 fishermen entered its ninth day .
Indian fishermen said on Wednesday they had been forced at gunpoint to ferry refugees fleeing the ethnic war in Sri Lanka to India , as a protest strike by more than 30,000 fishermen entered its ninth day .
0,1 MISC|19,21 LOC|22,23 LOC

" There is little we can do when at mid-sea .
" There is little we can do when at mid-sea .


The LTTE ( Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam ) accosts us and , at the point of a gun , forces us to take refugees , " said senior fishermen leader P. Arulanandam .
The LTTE ( Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam ) accosts us and , at the point of a gun , forces us to take refugees , " said senior fishermen leader P. Arulanandam .
1,2 ORG|3,8 ORG|31,33 PER

Some 850 refugees have landed in recent weeks at the port of Rameswaram in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu , home to 50 million Tamil-speaking people , port officials say .
Some 850 refugees have landed in recent weeks at the port of Rameswaram in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu , home to 50 million Tamil-speaking people , port officials say .
12,13 LOC|16,17 MISC|19,21 LOC|26,27 MISC

Rameswaram is 15 km ( 10 miles ) off the coast of Sri Lanka .
Rameswaram is 15 km ( 10 miles ) off the coast of Sri Lanka .
0,1 LOC|12,14 LOC

State chief minister M. Karunanidhi has publicly welcomed the refugees , who are fleeing the 13-year war between Tamil separatists and government troops that Colombo says has cost 50,000 lives .
State chief minister M. Karunanidhi has publicly welcomed the refugees , who are fleeing the 13-year war between Tamil separatists and government troops that Colombo says has cost 50,000 lives .
3,5 PER|18,19 MISC|24,25 LOC

But the influx has triggered fears of a repeat of the 1980s when some 200,000 refugees landed in Tamil Nadu .
But the influx has triggered fears of a repeat of the 1980s when some 200,000 refugees landed in Tamil Nadu .
18,20 LOC

Intelligence officals said more than 5,000 Tamils were waiting on the western coast of Sri Lanka to cross into India .
Intelligence officals said more than 5,000 Tamils were waiting on the western coast of Sri Lanka to cross into India .
6,7 MISC|14,16 LOC|19,20 LOC

The Indian government has warned its fishermen that their boats would be impounded if they were caught ferrying refugees .
The Indian government has warned its fishermen that their boats would be impounded if they were caught ferrying refugees .
1,2 MISC

The fishermen went on strike last week to protest the government 's cancellation of three trawlers ' fishing licenses after the boats were caught carrying Tamil refugees .
The fishermen went on strike last week to protest the government 's cancellation of three trawlers ' fishing licenses after the boats were caught carrying Tamil refugees .
25,26 MISC

All Fishermen 's Association secretary N.J. Bose said the strike would continue indefinitely and the fishermen would block road and rail traffic if their demands were not met .
All Fishermen 's Association secretary N.J. Bose said the strike would continue indefinitely and the fishermen would block road and rail traffic if their demands were not met .
0,4 ORG|5,7 PER

" Until the government releases our boats from naval custody and Sri Lankan naval custody , and gives us assurance ( it will not revoke licences of boats ferrying refugees ) , we will not call off our strike , " Bose said .
" Until the government releases our boats from naval custody and Sri Lankan naval custody , and gives us assurance ( it will not revoke licences of boats ferrying refugees ) , we will not call off our strike , " Bose said .
11,13 MISC|41,42 PER

LTTE spokesmen could not immediately be reached for comment , but Sri Lankan fishermen denied that Indians were being coerced into carrying refugees across the Palk Strait .

0,1 ORG|11,13 MISC|16,17 MISC|25,27 LOC

" Indian fishermen come right up to Pesalai to fish , and when refugees request them to ferry them across , they readily oblige .

1,2 MISC|7,8 LOC

Only some take money , " Sri Lankan boatman Chinnathambi said .

6,8 MISC|9,10 PER

Arulanandam denied the fishermen charged the refugees for passage to India and said it was unfair to penalise them for the refugees ' arrival .

0,1 PER|10,11 LOC

" We have not gone to sea since August 19 , but refugees are arriving daily nevertheless .
" We have not gone to sea since August 19 , but refugees are arriving daily nevertheless .


How could we alone be held responsible for the influx ? "

he said .
he said .

Evert will depart for Alexandroupolis on Saturday afternoon .

0,1 PER|4,5 LOC

Prime Minister Costas Simitis criticized Evert today for unleashing a seven-point economic package that offers tax relief to merchants and other professionals , higher pensions to farmers and support for small business .

2,4 PER|5,6 PER

The finance ministry estimated the cost of ND 's economic measures to over 600 billion drachmas but ND officials put the figure much lower to about 300 billion drachmas .

7,8 ORG|17,18 ORG

0,1 PER|2,3 ORG|9,10 ORG

0,2 LOC

U.S. investors in troubled Lloyd 's of London were considering late on Tuesday whether to appeal a U.S. court decision in favour of Lloyd 's and pledged to continue pursuing other legal actions .

0,1 LOC|4,8 ORG|17,18 LOC|23,25 ORG

A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday gave Lloyd 's a reprieve , throwing out an injunction that the insurance giant said could have led to its collapse .

1,2 LOC|7,9 ORG

A lower court issued the injunction on Friday and ordered Lloyd 's to give investors , known as Names , more information before requiring them to decide whether to accept a settlement offer as part of a reorganisation plan .
A lower court issued the injunction on Friday and ordered Lloyd 's to give investors , known as Names , more information before requiring them to decide whether to accept a settlement offer as part of a reorganisation plan .
10,12 ORG|18,19 MISC

" My prediction is that the Names will appeal , " said Kenneth Chiate , a U.S. Name and a chief negotiator for the American Names Association .

6,7 MISC|12,14 PER|16,17 LOC|17,18 MISC|24,27 ORG

" At this point , it is a sufficiently important decision that I 'm confident that they will appeal , " he said . "
" At this point , it is a sufficiently important decision that I 'm confident that they will appeal , " he said . "


But to say that they definitely will would be premature until we determine what the exact basis for the court 's ruling is . "
But to say that they definitely will would be premature until we determine what the exact basis for the court 's ruling is . "


Under the reorganisation plan , Lloyd 's plans to reinsure its massive liabilities into a new company called Equitas .
Under the reorganisation plan , Lloyd 's plans to reinsure its massive liabilities into a new company called Equitas .
5,7 ORG|18,19 ORG

The arrangement calls for investors to make additional payments to fund Equitas but also provides them with 3.2 billion stg in compensation to help reduce their prior outstanding liabilities .
The arrangement calls for investors to make additional payments to fund Equitas but also provides them with 3.2 billion stg in compensation to help reduce their prior outstanding liabilities .
11,12 ORG

The Names had been scheduled to decide whether to accept or reject the offer by 1100 GMT Wednesday , but Lloyd 's chairman David Rowland said on Tuesday the offer would be extended .

Spanish tomato warriors paint the town red .
Spanish tomato warriors paint the town red .
0,1 MISC

BUNOL , Spain 1996-08-28
BUNOL , Spain 1996-08-28
0,1 LOC|2,3 LOC

Revellers painted the town red on Wednesday as the 1996 edition of the world 's biggest tomato fight began in the eastern Spanish village of Bunol .
Revellers painted the town red on Wednesday as the 1996 edition of the world 's biggest tomato fight began in the eastern Spanish village of Bunol .
22,23 MISC|25,26 LOC

Thousands of people pelted each other with armfuls of ripe tomatoes as streets , walls and windows were coated in a blood-red wash .
Thousands of people pelted each other with armfuls of ripe tomatoes as streets , walls and windows were coated in a blood-red wash .


A single firework after midday signalled the start of the fruit-throwing frenzy , during which participants hurl some 100 tonnes of tomatoes trucked in for the occasion .
A single firework after midday signalled the start of the fruit-throwing frenzy , during which participants hurl some 100 tonnes of tomatoes trucked in for the occasion .


Local historians say the tradition began in 1945 when disgruntled locals began spontaneously to bombard the priest and mayor at the annual fiesta in Bunol ( pronounced Boo-nee-OL ) .
Local historians say the tradition began in 1945 when disgruntled locals began spontaneously to bombard the priest and mayor at the annual fiesta in Bunol ( pronounced Boo-nee-OL ) .
24,25 LOC|27,28 LOC

The festival 's fame has grown and now attracts between 15,000 and 20,000 people , many of them foreigners .
The festival 's fame has grown and now attracts between 15,000 and 20,000 people , many of them foreigners .

Iraq balks at U.N. staff for oil-for-food deal .
Iraq balks at U.N. staff for oil-for-food deal .
0,1 LOC|3,4 ORG

Evelyn Leopold
Evelyn Leopold
0,2 PER

UNITED NATIONS 1996-08-28
UNITED NATIONS 1996-08-28
0,2 ORG

Iraq has balked at the number of U.N. staff needed to implement the oil-for-food deal , blaming the United States for insisting on stringent monitoring .
Iraq has balked at the number of U.N. staff needed to implement the oil-for-food deal , blaming the United States for insisting on stringent monitoring .
0,1 LOC|7,8 ORG|18,20 LOC

In comments to reporters and a statement on Tuesday , Iraqi diplomats said the cost of the monitors and other staff , which Baghdad has to finance , surpasses funds allocated for electricity , water , sewers , education and agriculture .
In comments to reporters and a statement on Tuesday , Iraqi diplomats said the cost of the monitors and other staff , which Baghdad has to finance , surpasses funds allocated for electricity , water , sewers , education and agriculture .
10,11 MISC|23,24 LOC

At issue was a May 20 agreement allowing Iraq to sell $ 2 billion worth of oil to purchase badly needed food , medicine and other supplies to ease the impact of sanctions in force since its troops invaded Kuwait in August 1990 .
At issue was a May 20 agreement allowing Iraq to sell $ 2 billion worth of oil to purchase badly needed food , medicine and other supplies to ease the impact of sanctions in force since its troops invaded Kuwait in August 1990 .
8,9 LOC|39,40 LOC

The Iraqi statement said the United States was " interfering and pressing to augment the number of international staff and this is not legal and not justified . "
The Iraqi statement said the United States was " interfering and pressing to augment the number of international staff and this is not legal and not justified . "
1,2 MISC|5,7 LOC

Iraq 's deputy ambassador , Saeed Hasan , noted that the May 20 accord said that the number of personnel would be determined by the United Nations and that the government of Iraq would be consulted .
Iraq 's deputy ambassador , Saeed Hasan , noted that the May 20 accord said that the number of personnel would be determined by the United Nations and that the government of Iraq would be consulted .
0,1 LOC|5,7 PER|25,27 ORG|32,33 LOC

Saeed in his comments did not threaten to call off the deal and the U.N. officials said they expected it to go into force next month after Secretary-General Boutros Boutros-Ghali reports that arrangements are in place .
Saeed in his comments did not threaten to call off the deal and the U.N. officials said they expected it to go into force next month after Secretary-General Boutros Boutros-Ghali reports that arrangements are in place .
0,1 PER|14,15 ORG|28,30 PER

The U.N. Department of Humanitarian Affairs ( DHA ) , which has to coordinate the distribution of food , medicine and other goods , increased the number of monitors earlier this month at the insistence of the United States .

1,6 ORG|7,8 ORG|37,39 LOC

According to U.N. officials and diplomats , Iraq would have about $ 1.13 billion to spend for food , medicine and other goods after monies for a reparations fund for Gulf War victims and costs for U.N. weapons inspections were deducted .
According to U.N. officials and diplomats , Iraq would have about $ 1.13 billion to spend for food , medicine and other goods after monies for a reparations fund for Gulf War victims and costs for U.N. weapons inspections were deducted .
2,3 ORG|7,8 LOC|30,32 MISC|36,37 ORG

The cost of the U.N. staff overseeing the distribution of food and other supplies was estimated to cost $ 31 million .
The cost of the U.N. staff overseeing the distribution of food and other supplies was estimated to cost $ 31 million .
4,5 ORG

In addition another $ 12 million was anticipated to cover other expenses , such as oil experts and administrative costs .
In addition another $ 12 million was anticipated to cover other expenses , such as oil experts and administrative costs .


For the distribution and supervision of humanitarian supplies the United Nations estimated it needed 1,190 people , including 267 international staff and 923 Iraqi support staff .
For the distribution and supervision of humanitarian supplies the United Nations estimated it needed 1,190 people , including 267 international staff and 923 Iraqi support staff .
9,11 ORG|23,24 MISC

Of this number 64 foreign and 598 local staff would be in the northern Kurdish provinces , no longer the direct control of the Baghdad government .

14,15 MISC|24,25 LOC

Another 203 international staff and 325 Iraqis would run the programme in the central and southern parts of the country .

6,7 MISC

There are also 14 monitors to watch oil flows , 32 customs experts and four New York-based oil experts or overseers to approve contracts .

EU Commission cool on changing beef cull plan .
EU Commission cool on changing beef cull plan .
0,2 ORG

BRUSSELS 1996-08-29
BRUSSELS 1996-08-29
0,1 LOC

The European Commission said on Thursday it would study scientific reports saying Britain 's mad cow epidemic would die out by 2001 but offered little prospect the findings would change an agreed slaughter campaign .
The European Commission said on Thursday it would study scientific reports saying Britain 's mad cow epidemic would die out by 2001 but offered little prospect the findings would change an agreed slaughter campaign .
1,3 ORG|12,13 LOC

" Obviously we are interested in this research .
" Obviously we are interested in this research .


We will ask the ( EU ) scientific and veterinary committee to examine it , " Commission spokesman Gerard Kiely told Reuters .
We will ask the ( EU ) scientific and veterinary committee to examine it , " Commission spokesman Gerard Kiely told Reuters .
5,6 ORG|16,17 ORG|18,20 PER|21,22 ORG

But he added that new research into the dynamics of the bovine spongiform encephalopathy ( BSE ) , a fatal brain-wasting disease suffered by cattle , was unlikely to alter a slaughter plan agreed by Britain and its 14 EU partners .
But he added that new research into the dynamics of the bovine spongiform encephalopathy ( BSE ) , a fatal brain-wasting disease suffered by cattle , was unlikely to alter a slaughter plan agreed by Britain and its 14 EU partners .
15,16 MISC|35,36 LOC|39,40 ORG

" We agreed that following detailed scientific analysis using a methodology which would take out the maximum number of BSE cases possible .
" We agreed that following detailed scientific analysis using a methodology which would take out the maximum number of BSE cases possible .
19,20 MISC

I think it would be very difficult to sell to the European Commission a programme which would involve the elimination of fewer BSE cases , " Kiely said .
I think it would be very difficult to sell to the European Commission a programme which would involve the elimination of fewer BSE cases , " Kiely said .
11,13 ORG|22,23 MISC|26,27 PER

" We will look at our approach ( to the plan ) but we wo n't get involved with the number of animals to be slaughtered , " he said .
" We will look at our approach ( to the plan ) but we wo n't get involved with the number of animals to be slaughtered , " he said .


" We have always avoided the question of numbers of animals to be slaughtered , that 's not the issue .
" We have always avoided the question of numbers of animals to be slaughtered , that 's not the issue .


The issue is the protection of consumers ' health and the rapid eradication of BSE , " he added .
The issue is the protection of consumers ' health and the rapid eradication of BSE , " he added .
14,15 MISC

The reaction is likely to disappoint British farmers , who seized on research by Oxford scientists in the scientific journal Nature saying it would be hard to get rid of the disease any faster than 2001 without killing vast numbers of cattle .
The reaction is likely to disappoint British farmers , who seized on research by Oxford scientists in the scientific journal Nature saying it would be hard to get rid of the disease any faster than 2001 without killing vast numbers of cattle .
6,7 MISC|14,15 ORG|20,21 ORG

The researchers predicted there would be 340 new infections and 14,000 new cases of BSE before 2001 .
The researchers predicted there would be 340 new infections and 14,000 new cases of BSE before 2001 .
14,15 MISC

British farmers ' leader called on Wednesday for an urgent meeting with ministers to discuss the report .
British farmers ' leader called on Wednesday for an urgent meeting with ministers to discuss the report .
0,1 MISC

" I hope the government will now make it clear they believe there is a better way of dealing with this issue , " National Farmers Union president Sir David Naish told BBC radio .
" I hope the government will now make it clear they believe there is a better way of dealing with this issue , " National Farmers Union president Sir David Naish told BBC radio .
24,27 ORG|29,31 PER|32,34 ORG

Naish said there was no need for Britain to carry out a planned cull of some 147,000 cattle to which it had reluctantly agreed to placate its European partners .
Naish said there was no need for Britain to carry out a planned cull of some 147,000 cattle to which it had reluctantly agreed to placate its European partners .
0,1 PER|7,8 LOC|27,28 MISC

" The new evidence to me means some of that proposal should be re-examined because we could get away with considerably less animals being culled if in fact scientists throughout Europe accepted this evidence , " Naish said .
" The new evidence to me means some of that proposal should be re-examined because we could get away with considerably less animals being culled if in fact scientists throughout Europe accepted this evidence , " Naish said .
30,31 LOC|36,37 PER

The report could well reopen a damaging row between Britain and the EU , which slapped a worldwide ban on British beef after the government said there could be a link between BSE and the human form of the disease .
The report could well reopen a damaging row between Britain and the EU , which slapped a worldwide ban on British beef after the government said there could be a link between BSE and the human form of the disease .
9,10 LOC|12,13 ORG|20,21 MISC|32,33 MISC

The issue flared in in March when government scientists admitted that people could become infected with Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease ( CJD ) from eating BSE-infected beef .
The issue flared in in March when government scientists admitted that people could become infected with Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease ( CJD ) from eating BSE-infected beef .

2,3 PER|4,5 LOC

MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-29
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-29
0,1 LOC|2,3 LOC

Tight bowling from Glamorgan off-spinner Robert Croft helped England to restrict Pakistan to 225 for five in their 50 overs in the first one-day international at Old Trafford on Thursday .
Tight bowling from Glamorgan off-spinner Robert Croft helped England to restrict Pakistan to 225 for five in their 50 overs in the first one-day international at Old Trafford on Thursday .
3,4 ORG|5,7 PER|8,9 LOC|11,12 LOC|26,28 LOC

Croft , who was one of the few Englishmen to make a good impression in his test debut at The Oval last week , showed great control as he first dried up the early flow of Pakistan runs and then collected the wickets of Aamir Sohail and Wasim Akram in a spell of 10-1-36-2 .
Croft , who was one of the few Englishmen to make a good impression in his test debut at The Oval last week , showed great control as he first dried up the early flow of Pakistan runs and then collected the wickets of Aamir Sohail and Wasim Akram in a spell of 10-1-36-2 .
0,1 PER|8,9 MISC|19,21 LOC|36,37 LOC|44,46 PER|47,49 PER

There was also a wicket each for Ronnie Irani , Allan Mullally and Darren Gough although there was no joy for Dean Headley who , along with Lancashire batsman Graham Lloyd , was making his international debut .
There was also a wicket each for Ronnie Irani , Allan Mullally and Darren Gough although there was no joy for Dean Headley who , along with Lancashire batsman Graham Lloyd , was making his international debut .
7,9 PER|10,12 PER|13,15 PER|21,23 PER|27,28 ORG|29,31 PER

After Wasim had won the toss and chosen to bat first , Pakistani made an excellent start as Sohail and Saeed Anwar continued their good form with an opening partnership of 82 .
After Wasim had won the toss and chosen to bat first , Pakistani made an excellent start as Sohail and Saeed Anwar continued their good form with an opening partnership of 82 .
1,2 PER|12,13 MISC|18,19 PER|20,22 PER

Anwar , who struck a superb 176 at The Oval , was the more aggressive as he made 57 from 75 balls before skying a catch off Irani to Mullally at long-on .
Anwar , who struck a superb 176 at The Oval , was the more aggressive as he made 57 from 75 balls before skying a catch off Irani to Mullally at long-on .
0,1 PER|8,10 LOC|27,28 PER|29,30 PER

Sohail and Ijaz Ahmed then added 59 for the second wicket before England struck back with three wickets for 19 in the space of five overs .
Sohail and Ijaz Ahmed then added 59 for the second wicket before England struck back with three wickets for 19 in the space of five overs .
0,1 PER|2,4 PER|12,13 LOC

First , Sohail , after making 48 , was bowled by Croft as he stepped back to try and hit through the off-side .
First , Sohail , after making 48 , was bowled by Croft as he stepped back to try and hit through the off-side .
2,3 PER|11,12 PER

Wasim , who promoted himself to number four in the order , followed for six when Croft drifted another well-flighted delivery behind his legs .
Wasim , who promoted himself to number four in the order , followed for six when Croft drifted another well-flighted delivery behind his legs .
0,1 PER|16,17 PER

Shortly after Ijaz was also back in the pavilion for 48 after Irani had repaid Mullally with another good catch at long-on .
Shortly after Ijaz was also back in the pavilion for 48 after Irani had repaid Mullally with another good catch at long-on .
2,3 PER|12,13 PER|15,16 PER

Gough later bowled Moin Khan with an inswinging yorker but Inzamam-ul-Haq , 37 not out , and Salim Malik took Pakistan to 225 for five when the overs ran out .
Gough later bowled Moin Khan with an inswinging yorker but Inzamam-ul-Haq , 37 not out , and Salim Malik took Pakistan to 225 for five when the overs ran out .

LONDON 1996-08-29

0,1 LOC

Linford Christie has confirmed he will run in a " Dream Team " sprint relay at the Berlin grand prix athletics meeting on Friday .
Linford Christie has confirmed he will run in a " Dream Team " sprint relay at the Berlin grand prix athletics meeting on Friday .
0,2 PER|10,12 ORG|17,18 LOC

A spokeswoman for Christie said the former Olympic 100 metres champion had agreed to captain a quality quartet which also includes Canada 's Donovan Bailey , the current Olympic champion and world record holder , and Namibian Frankie Fredericks .
A spokeswoman for Christie said the former Olympic 100 metres champion had agreed to captain a quality quartet which also includes Canada 's Donovan Bailey , the current Olympic champion and world record holder , and Namibian Frankie Fredericks .
3,4 PER|7,8 MISC|21,22 LOC|23,25 PER|28,29 MISC|37,39 PER

Christie is retiring from international competition at the end of the season , but Berlin promoter Rudi Thiel has persuaded him to join what is intended to be a special tribute to Jesse Owens , who won four gold medals 60 years ago at the Berlin Olympics .

HARARE 1996-08-29

England-based goalkeeper Bruce Grobbelaar has been appointed temporary head coach of the Zimbabwe national soccer team for two international matches , the Zimbabwe Football Association ( ZIFA ) said on Thursday .

0,1 MISC|2,4 PER|12,13 LOC|22,25 ORG|26,27 ORG

ZIFA vice-chairman Vincent Pamire said Grobbelaar would take charge for a match against Tanzania in Harare on September 29 in the five-nation Castle Cup of Africa tournament and an African Nations ' Cup first round qualifier against Sudan in Khartoum on October 5 .
ZIFA vice-chairman Vincent Pamire said Grobbelaar would take charge for a match against Tanzania in Harare on September 29 in the five-nation Castle Cup of Africa tournament and an African Nations ' Cup first round qualifier against Sudan in Khartoum on October 5 .
0,1 ORG|2,4 PER|5,6 PER|13,14 LOC|15,16 LOC|22,26 MISC|29,33 MISC|37,38 LOC|39,40 LOC

Grobbelaar takes over until a permanent replacement is appointed for Zimbabwe 's previous coach , Switzerland 's Marc Duvillard .
Grobbelaar takes over until a permanent replacement is appointed for Zimbabwe 's previous coach , Switzerland 's Marc Duvillard .
0,1 PER|10,11 LOC|15,16 LOC|17,19 PER

Grobbelaar now plays for English second division leaders Plymouth Argyle after years in the top flight with Liverpool and Southampton .
Grobbelaar now plays for English second division leaders Plymouth Argyle after years in the top flight with Liverpool and Southampton .
0,1 PER|4,5 MISC|8,10 ORG|17,18 ORG|19,20 ORG

Grobbelaar , fellow goalkeeper Hans Segers , retired striker John Fashanu and Malaysian businessman Heng Suan Lim pleaded not guilty in May to charges of giving or accepting bribes to fix English premier league matches .

0,1 PER|4,6 PER|9,11 PER|12,13 MISC|14,17 PER|31,32 MISC

TENNIS - MARTINEZ GETS AGGRESSIVE AT U.S. OPEN .

2,3 PER|6,8 MISC

Larry Fine
Larry Fine
0,2 PER

NEW YORK 1996-08-28
NEW YORK 1996-08-28
0,2 LOC

Conchita Martinez decided that when in New York , do as the New Yorkers do -- and the Spaniard 's new-found aggressiveness seems to have put her in the right frame of mind for the U.S. Open .
Conchita Martinez decided that when in New York , do as the New Yorkers do -- and the Spaniard 's new-found aggressiveness seems to have put her in the right frame of mind for the U.S. Open .
0,2 PER|6,8 LOC|12,14 MISC|18,19 MISC|35,37 MISC

The fourth-seeded Spaniard , who is tackling the world class traffic of New York City as a warm-up by driving to the tennis centre for her matches , ran over France 's Nathalie Tauziat 6-1 6-3 on Wednesday to take her place in the third round .

Adrian Warner
Adrian Warner
0,2 PER

BERLIN 1996-08-29
BERLIN 1996-08-29
0,1 LOC

Olympic champions Michael Johnson and Donovan Bailey and former champion Linford Christie will run in a " Dream Team " sprint relay squad in honour of Jesse Owens on Friday .
Olympic champions Michael Johnson and Donovan Bailey and former champion Linford Christie will run in a " Dream Team " sprint relay squad in honour of Jesse Owens on Friday .
0,1 MISC|2,4 PER|5,7 PER|10,12 PER|17,19 ORG|26,28 PER

Johnson , the 200 metres world record holder , and Britain 's 1992 Olympic 100 champion Christie confirmed on Thursday that they would join 100 record holder Bailey and Namibia 's Frankie Fredericks in one of the greatest 4x100 squads ever assembled .
Johnson , the 200 metres world record holder , and Britain 's 1992 Olympic 100 champion Christie confirmed on Thursday that they would join 100 record holder Bailey and Namibia 's Frankie Fredericks in one of the greatest 4x100 squads ever assembled .
0,1 PER|10,11 LOC|13,14 MISC|16,17 PER|27,28 PER|29,30 LOC|31,33 PER

They will run against quartets from the United States , Europe and Africa in a special race at the Berlin Grand Prix meeting to mark the 60th anniversary of Owens 's four gold medals at the 1936 Olympics in the German capital .
They will run against quartets from the United States , Europe and Africa in a special race at the Berlin Grand Prix meeting to mark the 60th anniversary of Owens 's four gold medals at the 1936 Olympics in the German capital .
7,9 LOC|10,11 LOC|12,13 LOC|19,20 LOC|20,22 MISC|29,30 PER|37,38 MISC|40,41 MISC

Christie will run the anchor leg after Canada 's Bailey , American Johnson and Olympic silver medallist Fredericks have run the first three stages of the relay .
Christie will run the anchor leg after Canada 's Bailey , American Johnson and Olympic silver medallist Fredericks have run the first three stages of the relay .
0,1 PER|7,8 LOC|9,10 PER|11,12 MISC|12,13 PER|14,15 MISC|17,18 PER

The participation of Bailey and Fredericks had been known before Thursday .

3,4 PER|5,6 PER

But Christie did not announce his decision to run until the eve of the meeting when organisers also confirmed Johnson would take part .

1,2 PER|19,20 PER

Christie is due to retire from international competition at the end of the season although he may compete for Britain in next season 's European Cup .

0,1 PER|19,20 LOC|24,26 MISC

1,2 PER|12,13 LOC|36,37 MISC

3,4 MISC|29,30 PER

Zaire installs first election delegates .
Zaire installs first election delegates .
0,1 LOC

KINSHASA 1996-08-29
KINSHASA 1996-08-29
0,1 LOC

A total of 116 delegates to Zaire 's National Election Commission ( CNE ) were formally installed on Thursday , launching another phase of the Central African nation 's much-delayed democratic transition .
A total of 116 delegates to Zaire 's National Election Commission ( CNE ) were formally installed on Thursday , launching another phase of the Central African nation 's much-delayed democratic transition .
6,7 LOC|8,11 ORG|12,13 ORG|25,27 MISC

The 116 , representing political parties in the capital Kinshasa , will help organise a voter census , a constitutional referendum planned for January and efforts to brief potential voters on what balloting involves .
The 116 , representing political parties in the capital Kinshasa , will help organise a voter census , a constitutional referendum planned for January and efforts to brief potential voters on what balloting involves .
9,10 LOC

A total of 9,446 delegates will be deployed throughout Zaire 's 11 provinces for the elections , which must be held by July 1997 under the transitional constitution .
A total of 9,446 delegates will be deployed throughout Zaire 's 11 provinces for the elections , which must be held by July 1997 under the transitional constitution .
9,10 LOC

Presidential , parliamentary and municipal elections are planned for May .
Presidential , parliamentary and municipal elections are planned for May .


" We can meet the required deadlines for organising the elections .
" We can meet the required deadlines for organising the elections .


All that is needed is for everyone to show goodwill , " Commission spokesman Yoka Lye Mudaba told reporters .
All that is needed is for everyone to show goodwill , " Commission spokesman Yoka Lye Mudaba told reporters .

BANGKOK 1996-08-29
BANGKOK 1996-08-29
0,1 LOC

Thailand 's powerful military thinks the government is dishonest and Prime Minister Banharn Silpa-archa 's resignation might solve the nation 's political and economic woes , an opinion poll showed on Thursday .
Thailand 's powerful military thinks the government is dishonest and Prime Minister Banharn Silpa-archa 's resignation might solve the nation 's political and economic woes , an opinion poll showed on Thursday .
0,1 LOC|12,14 PER

Nearly half the 1,617 military personnel surveyed in the Rajapat Institute poll suggested that Banharn resign , while about 28 percent thought he should dissolve parliament and 24 percent thought a cabinet reshuffle could resolve the government 's problems .
Nearly half the 1,617 military personnel surveyed in the Rajapat Institute poll suggested that Banharn resign , while about 28 percent thought he should dissolve parliament and 24 percent thought a cabinet reshuffle could resolve the government 's problems .
9,11 ORG|14,15 PER

Banharn , who leads a six-party , 13-month-old coalition government , faces a no-confidence debate in parliament next month .
Banharn , who leads a six-party , 13-month-old coalition government , faces a no-confidence debate in parliament next month .
0,1 PER

The prime minister , who has already lost one coalition partner this month , is expected to have a tough battle in the debate because of infighting in his own party and warnings of more pullouts by other coalition partners .
The prime minister , who has already lost one coalition partner this month , is expected to have a tough battle in the debate because of infighting in his own party and warnings of more pullouts by other coalition partners .


The poll , conducted earlier this month after Banharn 's coalition completed one year in office , showed the military would prefer General Chatichai Choonhavan -- a former prime minister who was ousted in a military coup in February 1991 -- as prime minister .
The poll , conducted earlier this month after Banharn 's coalition completed one year in office , showed the military would prefer General Chatichai Choonhavan -- a former prime minister who was ousted in a military coup in February 1991 -- as prime minister .

2,4 PER|10,13 ORG

Banharn came in last on the list of proposed leaders with less than one percent of the votes .
Banharn came in last on the list of proposed leaders with less than one percent of the votes .
0,1 PER

Nearly two-thirds of the people surveyed thought the government was dishonest and insincere , and 65 percent blamed the government 's poor performance for the country 's economic slowdown .
Nearly two-thirds of the people surveyed thought the government was dishonest and insincere , and 65 percent blamed the government 's poor performance for the country 's economic slowdown .


The opinion of the military in Thailand , which has seen 17 coups or attempted coups since the country switched to parliamentary democracy from absolute monarchy in 1932 , always carries weight in the political scene , despite officials ' vows to distance the military from politics .

Researchers report progress in muscular dystrophy .
Researchers report progress in muscular dystrophy .


PHILADELPHIA 1996-08-29
PHILADELPHIA 1996-08-29
0,1 LOC

University of Pennsylvania researchers on Thursday said a new gene-therapy technique for treating muscular dystrophy disease had shown progress in laboratory animals .
University of Pennsylvania researchers on Thursday said a new gene-therapy technique for treating muscular dystrophy disease had shown progress in laboratory animals .
0,3 ORG

Word of the findings , to be published in the Oct. 1 issue of the journal " Human Gene Therapy , " came in advance of the annual Jerry Lewis Labour Day weekend telethon to raise money for muscular dystrophy research .
Word of the findings , to be published in the Oct. 1 issue of the journal " Human Gene Therapy , " came in advance of the annual Jerry Lewis Labour Day weekend telethon to raise money for muscular dystrophy research .
17,20 ORG|28,32 MISC

Several hurdles must be overcome before the method is used in human trials .
Several hurdles must be overcome before the method is used in human trials .


Nevertheless , " a treatment based on the new strategy .... may have the potential to benefit many patients , " the University of Pennsylvania Medical Centre said in a release .
Nevertheless , " a treatment based on the new strategy .... may have the potential to benefit many patients , " the University of Pennsylvania Medical Centre said in a release .
22,25 ORG

Muscular dystrophy is a fatal illness in which the body 's muscle tissue degenerates and is replaced by fat .
Muscular dystrophy is a fatal illness in which the body 's muscle tissue degenerates and is replaced by fat .


Death strikes in early adulthood .
Death strikes in early adulthood .


Individuals with the disease have a non-working version of a gene responsible for producing a crucial muscle protein called dystrophin .
Individuals with the disease have a non-working version of a gene responsible for producing a crucial muscle protein called dystrophin .


In the study at the University 's Institute for Human Gene Therapy , researchers altered a common-cold virus to carry a version of the working dystrophin gene .
In the study at the University 's Institute for Human Gene Therapy , researchers altered a common-cold virus to carry a version of the working dystrophin gene .
7,12 ORG

The virus , which also was altered to minimise its susceptibility to the immune system , was then injected into the muscle cells of mice bred to lack dystrophin genes .
The virus , which also was altered to minimise its susceptibility to the immune system , was then injected into the muscle cells of mice bred to lack dystrophin genes .


In the experiment , between 30 to 40 percent of the muscle fibers in one group of mice produced dystrophin for two weeks before diminishing .
In the experiment , between 30 to 40 percent of the muscle fibers in one group of mice produced dystrophin for two weeks before diminishing .


Similar results had been obtained previously in test-tube cell cultures , but not in live animals , the university said .
Similar results had been obtained previously in test-tube cell cultures , but not in live animals , the university said .


The university said methods are still needed to make enough of the altered virus to treat humans , to further decrease the immune-system response to the virus , and to deliver the virus to human muscle tissue .
The university said methods are still needed to make enough of the altered virus to treat humans , to further decrease the immune-system response to the virus , and to deliver the virus to human muscle tissue .

Sierra Semiconductor jumps on exit plan .
Sierra Semiconductor jumps on exit plan .
0,2 ORG

Martin Wolk
Martin Wolk
0,2 PER

SEATTLE 1996-08-29
SEATTLE 1996-08-29
0,1 LOC

Sierra Semiconductor Corp jumped 23 percent Thursday on the expectation the company would emerge as a smaller but more profitable operation after its planned exit from the computer modem business .
Sierra Semiconductor Corp jumped 23 percent Thursday on the expectation the company would emerge as a smaller but more profitable operation after its planned exit from the computer modem business .
0,3 ORG

The San Jose , Calif. , company was up 2-1/8 at 11-3/8 after its announcement Wednesday that it planned to pull out of the highly competitive modem-chip business and focus instead on the fast-growing market for computer networking equipment .
The San Jose , Calif. , company was up 2-1/8 at 11-3/8 after its announcement Wednesday that it planned to pull out of the highly competitive modem-chip business and focus instead on the fast-growing market for computer networking equipment .
1,3 LOC|4,5 LOC

" Certainly the company will be a much smaller company now , but it will be a more profitable business , " said analyst Elias Moosa of Roberston Stephens & Co .
" Certainly the company will be a much smaller company now , but it will be a more profitable business , " said analyst Elias Moosa of Roberston Stephens & Co .

Leila Corcoran
Leila Corcoran
0,2 PER

WASHINGTON 1996-08-29
WASHINGTON 1996-08-29
0,1 LOC

A freed black man writes to his still-enslaved wife , a mother pleads with Abraham Lincoln on behalf of her son and a maimed soldier poses for an official photograph in newly reopened records that bring the U.S. Civil War back to life .
A freed black man writes to his still-enslaved wife , a mother pleads with Abraham Lincoln on behalf of her son and a maimed soldier poses for an official photograph in newly reopened records that bring the U.S. Civil War back to life .
14,16 PER|37,40 MISC

Working in the basement of the National Archives , members of the Civil War Conservation Corps are organising the military records of volunteers who fought for the North so that they can be preserved on microfilm .
Working in the basement of the National Archives , members of the Civil War Conservation Corps are organising the military records of volunteers who fought for the North so that they can be preserved on microfilm .
6,8 ORG|12,16 ORG|27,28 LOC

The faded documents have been stowed away in the Archives since it opened in 1935 and have rarely seen the light of day .
The faded documents have been stowed away in the Archives since it opened in 1935 and have rarely seen the light of day .
9,10 ORG

Each soldier 's file is a gold mine of information : enlistment papers , muster rolls , medical records , discharge certificates , letters and photographs .
Each soldier 's file is a gold mine of information : enlistment papers , muster rolls , medical records , discharge certificates , letters and photographs .


Since the project began almost two years ago , corps volunteers have focused on African American troops , preparing records in time for the unveiling in Washington this year of a special memorial to black soldiers who fought in the war .

14,16 MISC|26,27 LOC

More than 185,000 black soldiers fought and 37,000 died .
More than 185,000 black soldiers fought and 37,000 died .


In one letter , a black soldier heading South wrote his wife , " though great is the present national difficulties yet I look forward to a brighter day when I shall have the oportunity of seeing you in the full enjoyment of freedom .
In one letter , a black soldier heading South wrote his wife , " though great is the present national difficulties yet I look forward to a brighter day when I shall have the oportunity of seeing you in the full enjoyment of freedom .

Great is the outpouring of the coloured people that is now rallying with the heart of lions against the very curse that has separated you and me . "


In another letter dated January 1865 , a well-to-do Washington matron wrote to Lincoln to plead for her son , who faced a dishonourable discharge from the Army . "

Swedish options and derivatives exchange OM Gruppen AB said on Thursday it would open an electronic bourse for forest industry products in London in the first half of 1997 .

0,1 MISC|5,8 ORG|22,23 LOC

" Together with subsidiaries OMLX , the London Securities & Derivatives Exchange and OM Stockholm , OM Gruppen will open an international electronic bourse for forest products in the first half of 1997 , " OM Gruppen said in a statement .
" Together with subsidiaries OMLX , the London Securities & Derivatives Exchange and OM Stockholm , OM Gruppen will open an international electronic bourse for forest products in the first half of 1997 , " OM Gruppen said in a statement .
4,5 ORG|7,12 ORG|13,15 ORG|16,18 ORG|35,37 ORG

The first commodity to be traded on the PULPEX bourse will be pulp , but OM said trade would be extended to include products such as timber , recycled paper and other paper qualities .

8,9 ORG|15,16 ORG

" Through the establishment of PULPEX , London will have a commodities bourse for forest products which complements existing bourses for oil , metals and ' softs ' ( coffee , sugar and cocoa ) , " OM said .
" Through the establishment of PULPEX , London will have a commodities bourse for forest products which complements existing bourses for oil , metals and ' softs ' ( coffee , sugar and cocoa ) , " OM said .
5,6 ORG|7,8 LOC|37,38 ORG

PULPEX was the result of a three-year project run in cooperation between OM and representatives of the forest industry , the company said .
PULPEX was the result of a three-year project run in cooperation between OM and representatives of the forest industry , the company said .
0,1 ORG|12,13 ORG

Huge swings in the price of pulp over the past few years have made pulp producers ' profitability unpredictable , and made investing in new production capacity a risky business .
Huge swings in the price of pulp over the past few years have made pulp producers ' profitability unpredictable , and made investing in new production capacity a risky business .


" Without the ability to hedge prices , changes in the world market price for pulp has had an immediate impact on players ' profitability , " OM said .
" Without the ability to hedge prices , changes in the world market price for pulp has had an immediate impact on players ' profitability , " OM said .
27,28 ORG

It said global production of pulp amounted to around 200 million tonnes per year , of which around 20 percent or 40 million tonnes was sold on the spot market .


At current prices , the value of this production was around $ 25 billion .
At current prices , the value of this production was around $ 25 billion .


PULPEX will be both a marketplace and a clearing house , OM said , adding that the British Securities and Investments Board had been informed of OM 's plans .

Wall Street ponders Rubin 's role if Clinton wins .
Wall Street ponders Rubin 's role if Clinton wins .
0,2 LOC|3,4 PER|7,8 PER

Donna Sells
Donna Sells
0,2 PER

NEW YORK
NEW YORK
0,2 LOC

The outcome of the November elections emerged as a hot topic on Wall Street this week as financial pundits debated whether Robert Rubin might forgo a second term as Treasury secretary if President Clinton is re-elected .
The outcome of the November elections emerged as a hot topic on Wall Street this week as financial pundits debated whether Robert Rubin might forgo a second term as Treasury secretary if President Clinton is re-elected .
12,14 LOC|21,23 PER|29,30 ORG|33,34 PER

Concern centred on the currency markets since Rubin 's tour de force has been his unflagging support of the dollar .
Concern centred on the currency markets since Rubin 's tour de force has been his unflagging support of the dollar .
7,8 PER

Speculation that Rubin might not stay in his post grew after he sidestepped questions about any future Cabinet post during television interviews at the Democratic convention in Chicago this week .
Speculation that Rubin might not stay in his post grew after he sidestepped questions about any future Cabinet post during television interviews at the Democratic convention in Chicago this week .
2,3 PER|17,18 ORG|24,25 MISC|27,28 LOC

Should Rubin leave , Wall Street would worry that he might take his strong-dollar policy with him .
Should Rubin leave , Wall Street would worry that he might take his strong-dollar policy with him .
1,2 PER|4,6 LOC

Rubin 's predecessor at the Treasury , Lloyd Bentsen , was viewed with suspicion by some in the financial markets who thought he had tried to push down the dollar to gain an edge in trade negotiations with Japan .
Rubin 's predecessor at the Treasury , Lloyd Bentsen , was viewed with suspicion by some in the financial markets who thought he had tried to push down the dollar to gain an edge in trade negotiations with Japan .
0,1 PER|5,6 ORG|7,9 PER|38,39 LOC

" Obviously , under the Clinton administration , we 've seen two distinctively different dollar policies , " said Chris Widness , an international economist at Chase Securities Inc. " Under Rubin , the U.S. has certainly looked for a strong dollar . "
" Obviously , under the Clinton administration , we 've seen two distinctively different dollar policies , " said Chris Widness , an international economist at Chase Securities Inc. " Under Rubin , the U.S. has certainly looked for a strong dollar . "
5,6 PER|19,21 PER|26,29 ORG|31,32 PER|34,35 LOC

That strategy , backed up by timely instances of joint central bank intervention , helped the dollar battle back from post-Second World War lows of 1.3438 German marks on March 8 , 1995 , and 79.75 Japanese yen on April 19 , 1995 .
That strategy , backed up by timely instances of joint central bank intervention , helped the dollar battle back from post-Second World War lows of 1.3438 German marks on March 8 , 1995 , and 79.75 Japanese yen on April 19 , 1995 .
20,23 MISC|26,27 MISC|36,37 MISC

Currently , the dollar stands at about 1.48 marks and 109 yen .
Currently , the dollar stands at about 1.48 marks and 109 yen .


Rubin was widely hailed as the architect of the dollar 's comeback , using skills and expertise gained in 26 years on Wall Street , part of which were spent as co-chairman of Goldman , Sachs and Co .

Still , markets may have little to fear from any Rubin successor because the firm dollar policy has yielded positive results .
